The Toronto Raptors ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 4 - 14 ) 122 - 95 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 68 percent from beyond the arc , while the Sixers finished at 42 percent from both the floor and 41 percent from deep . They also out - rebounded the Sixers 42 - 38 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The Sixers were led by Robert Covington , who went 7 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Sergio Rodriguez was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 11 points ( 4 for 7 FG , 2 for 3 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , seven assists and three rebounds . He did have seven turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the rookie . Jahlil Okafor was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 15 points ( 7 for 14 FG , 1 for 2 FT ) and five rebounds . The 76ers will look to get out of this rut on Friday , when they play the New York Knicks on the road . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors , as usual . He went 7 for 9 from the floor , 6 for 6 from the free throw line and 4 for 5 from the foul line to finish with 24 points , to go along with eight assists and four rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 8 assists . DeMar DeRozan struggled shooting the ball , going 0 for 13 from the four - point range , but still finished with 14 points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Terrence Ross continued his strong play off the bench . He finished with 22 points ( 8 for 11 FG , 3 for 5 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) in 23 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded 12 points ( 6 for 12 FG ) and 11 rebounds , while DeMarre Carroll chipped in with 10 points , five rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Despite the loss , the Raptors still hold the Eastern Conference 's best record . They 'll look to build off this win when they take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
 The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 30 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 5 ) 102 - 101 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 34 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the way , as the Sixers never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Cavs were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field , while the Sixers finished at 46 percent . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , finishing with 25 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 14 assists , eight rebounds , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Kevin Love recorded a double - double with 20 points and 11 rebounds , while J.R. Smith added 11 points and three steals , in 32 minutes . Tristan Thompson chipped in with seven points and 13 rebounds , in 30 minutes . Kyrie Irving struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 17 from the floor , but still finished with eight points , seven rebounds and two assists , in 34 minutes . Joel Embiid was the high - point man for the Sixers , with 22 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 3PT ) , to go along with six rebounds , four blocked shots , two assists and one steal , in 25 minutes . Dario Saric started in place of the injured Jahlil Okafor , who sat out with an ankle injury . Saric finished with three points and seven rebounds in 18 minutes . Sergio Rodriguez recorded a triple - double in 31 minutes , as he had seven points , 11 assists and six rebounds . Nerlens Noel led the Sixers in scoring off the bench , with 21 points on 8 - 13 shooting , including 4 - 6 from deep , in 28 minutes . Gerald Henderson added 11 , two rebounds , one assist and two steals , while Nik Stauskas added 5 points , two rebounds and zero blocks , in 19 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for the Cavs . The Sixers will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
 The Houston Rockets ( 56 - 26 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 38 - 44 ) 117 - 91 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 43 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz finished at just 38 percent shooting from the floor and a meager 19 percent from deep . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they led by double - digits for the majority of the game . James Harden led the way for Houston , as he finished with 16 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 10 assists in 27 minutes . He also recorded a triple - double with 11 rebounds , 10 assists and one block . Terrence Jones was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG ) , two rebounds and three blocked shots in 20 minutes . Dwight Howard recorded 14 points and eight rebounds in 21 minutes , while Eric Gordon chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and three blocks in 18 minutes off the bench . For the Jazz , it was a forgettable night for them offensively . Rudy Gobert was the only starter to score in double figures , finishing with just eight points , while Joe Johnson led the team in scoring with 14 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 7 FT ) in 25 minutes . Rodney Hood finished with 10 points and two rebounds in 22 minutes . Derrick Favors played just nine minutes and finished with four points , four rebounds and one assist . Up next , the Rockets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Utah will head home to go up against the Clippers on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 46 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 24 - 53 ) 119 - 108 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 26 percent from beyond the arc , while the Lakers finished at 51 percent shooting from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 24 assists to 12 turnovers and the Lakers committing 18 turnovers to just 21 assists . John Wall did all he could to keep the Wizards in this one , as he led all scorers with 34 points ( 14 - 25 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 14 assists , three rebounds and four steals , in 37 minutes . Bradley Beal was n't far behind , finishing with 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) , three assists and one rebound , in 35 minutes . Otto Porter , Jr. was the only other starter in double figures , with his 16 points and four rebounds , in 30 minutes . The Lakers were led by D'Angelo Russell , who finished with 28 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 4 - 12 3PT ) , six rebounds and nine assists , in 40 minutes . Jordan Clarkson went 10 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . The only other players to score in double digits for the Lakers were Ivica Zubac with 00 points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and Julius Randle with six points ( 4 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) . Next , the Lakers will look to get back on track on Friday , when they play the Minnesota Timberwolves on the road . Meanwhile , the Wizards will head back home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
 The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 5 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 8 ) 124 - 105 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 34 - 40 right away in the first quarter and never looking back . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as they led by at least 12 points for the entirety of the second and third quarters . They shot 55 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range , while the Nets shot 38 percent from beyond the arc and 38 percent from long range . Russell Westbrook was the star of the show for the Thunder , as he tallied 30 points ( 13 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 13 assists in 34 minutes . Victor Oladipo finished with 26 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own , to go along with six assists and five rebounds in 36 minutes . Steven Adams finished with 15 points and seven rebounds in 32 minutes , while Enes Kanter chipped in 13 points ( 3 - 4 FG ) and three rebounds in 13 minutes off the bench . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with 22 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 x 2 FT ) and four rebounds in 28 minutes . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 13 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals in 28 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic added 13 points and two assists in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nets was Quincy Acy , who added 10 points in 21 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Brooklyn will head home to go up against the Grizzlies on Friday .

The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the second quarter , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Rockets , who shot 44 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the three - point line . Hickson recorded his first double - double of the season , with 14 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) , 10 boards and two blocked shots , in 22 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nuggets was Will Barton , who finished with nine points ( 3 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) . Up next , the Rockets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Nuggets will head home to go up against the Kings on Friday .

The Pacers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 29 in the first quarter and 35 - 14 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as the Knicks were n't able to get it within double - digits for the majority of the second half . Up next , the Pacers will stay home to take on the Nets on Wednesday , while the Knicks will head home to play the Heat on Wednesday .
 The Atlanta Hawks ( 44 - 30 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 39 - 35 ) 112 - 95 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons finished at 39 percent shooting from the floor and just 24 percent from long range . Paul Millsap led the Hawks in scoring with 23 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , five assists and four blocked shots , in 29 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Jeff Teague recorded a double - double with 12 points and 12 assists , along with zero rebounds and four steals , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Hawks was Kent Bazemore , who finished with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) , four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Al Horford chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , five rebounds and five assists , in 30 minutes . Tobias Harris led the way for the Pistons , with 21 points ( 10 - 20 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with 19 points and 17 rebounds , as he continues to be a force on both sides of the ball . The Pistons have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to fight to keep their playoff hopes alive . They 're currently in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are just a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls . They have three games remaining , including two against the Hornets and one against the Heat . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for Detroit , but they 're still in the thick of things in the race for the eighth seed in the East , and will look to get back on track as they play host to the Heat on Friday .

The Spurs were able to hold off the Magic in this one , despite being out - rebounded 50 - 49 by the Magic . The Magic were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field , while the Spurs went 41 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Spurs recording 20 assists to just 10 turnovers and the Magic committing 24 turnovers to just 12 assists . Despite the loss , the Spurs were still able to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they are now just a half - game behind the Golden State Warriors for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings . Up next , the Magic will look to get out of this rut on Friday , when they play the New York Knicks on the road , while The Spurs will head to Miami to take on the Heat on Friday .

The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the 76ers finished at 48 percent ( 48 percent ) from the floor and 43 percent from deep . They also out - rebounded the Sixers 48 - 35 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . Wesley Matthews was the high - point man for the Mavericks , going 8 - for - 12 for 21 points , while also adding three rebounds and two assists . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , giving him his second double - double of the season . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Chandler Parsons chipped in 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) , four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while Deron Williams added 15 points and eight assists . Zaza Pachulia had a solid game as well , finishing with nine points ( 2 - 5 FG ) , 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 19 minutes . The 76ers were led by Jahlil Okafor , who went off for a game - high of 31 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and one assist , in 32 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , while it was also his second game in a row with at least 20 points . Robert Covington was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 14 points and five rebounds , in 25 minutes . Nerlens Noel struggled to find his shot , going only 2 - of - 4 for four points , but he did grab five rebounds and dish out two assists in that time . The only other player to score in double figures for the Sixers was Richaun Holmes , who finished with 6 points , in 12 minutes off the bench . Ish Smith struggled to get things going offensively , going 0 for 0 from the three - point line and finishing with just three points . Up next , the Mavericks will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Philadelphia will head home to go up against the Trail Blazers on Friday .
 The Boston Celtics ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 4 - 6 ) 105 - 99 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Celtics were able to hold off the Pacers in this one , as they out - scored them 31 - 23 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Pacers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but it was n't enough to get it done against a rested Celtics team . Despite out - rebounding the Celtics 47 - 47 , the Pacers were held to 42 percent shooting from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , which may have been the difference in the game . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics in scoring , as he tallied 23 points and five assists in the win . He also shot 14 - of - 15 from the free throw line . Kelly Olynyk finished with 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , six rebounds and four assists , while Amir Johnson added 14 points and nine rebounds of his own . Avery Bradley finished with 13 points , eight rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Jeff Teague was the high - point man for the Pacers , with 20 . He shot just 4 - for - 15 ( 1 - 4 FG , 11 - 12 FT ) from the floor , but still finished with 20 points , four assists and three rebounds , in 35 minutes . Myles Turner was the only other Pacer to reach double figures in points . He finished with 17 points and eight rebounds in 30 minutes . Monta Ellis chipped in 15 points , while Thaddeus Young and C.J . Miles each added 8 points . Up next , the Celtics will head home Wednesday to take on the Wizards , while the Pacers will head to Toronto to play the Raptors on Wednesday .
 The visiting Boston Celtics defeated the Utah Jazz , 99 - 90 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 16 - 27 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped two straight and three of their last four . However , they were able to bounce back from those two losses with a convincing victory over the Jazz , as they defeated them on the backs of strong play from their bench . Kelly Olynyk led the way with 19 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting from the field , to go along with five rebounds , in 30 minutes off the bench . Jared Sullinger followed up with 12 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a steal , in 27 minutes , while Avery Bradley chipped in 12 points of his own , in 29 minutes . Marcus Smart added 9 points , three rebounds , zero blocks and an assist , while Jonas Jerebko added nine points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Jazz were led by Gordon Hayward , who posted 26 points , six rebounds , three steals and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Enes Kanter was next , with 20 points , while Derrick Favors followed up in the starting lineup with 13 points , eight rebounds , one assists , four blocks and four steals , in 34 minutes . Trey Burke led the bench with 18 points , zero rebounds and zero assists , in 32 minutes . Joe Ingles and Dante Exum combined for just seven points on 2 - of- 12 shooting , while Trey Burke was the only other Jazz player to score in double figures , as he finished with eighteen points , 0 rebounds and zero blocks in 32 minutes . Up next , the Celtics will head to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday night , while the Jazz will stay home and play the Trail Blazers on Saturday night .

The Pacers were able to use a strong second half where they out - scored the Magic 31 - 17 to secure the victory and end their four - game losing streak . They shot 52 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot 49 percent of their shots from the floor and 35 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Pacers 47 - 47 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . He 's now averaging 22 points and 10 rebounds on the year . It was his second 20 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds . Miles came off the bench to score 18 points , while adding three assists , two rebounds and one steal in 29 minutes . Next up , the Pacers will head home to take on the New York Knicks on Friday . Meanwhile , the Magic will look to end their losing streak when they host the Chicago Bulls on Friday , as they 'll be right back in action .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 23 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Mavericks battled back in the fourth quarter to make it a one - point game with just over three minutes to go . However , the Clippers out - scored the Mavericks 22 - 12 in the final quarter to seal the win and keep their playoff hopes alive . Chris Paul struggled shooting the ball , going just 2 - of - 10 from the field , but still finished with five points , seven rebounds and 11 assists in 35 minutes . Blake Griffin finished with 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , 11 rebounds , seven assists and two steals in 33 minutes . J.J. Redick was the high - point man for the Clippers , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt ) , to go along with one assist and one block in 31 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding two assists and one rebound in 26 minutes .  The Toronto Raptors ( 8 - 4 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 4 - 8 ) 113 - 111 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as the Nuggets never led by more than seven points in this overtime thriller . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , as he tallied 30 points ( 12 - 25 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists in the win . Kyle Lowry finished with 18 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , six rebounds and 13 assists of his own . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 assists on the year . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors . He finished with 15 points and nine rebounds in 37 minutes . The bench was huge for Toronto , as Terrence Ross , Cory Joseph and Patrick Patterson all scored 16 points or more . The Nuggets had a tough task here without Nikola Jokic ( knee ) and Jamal Murray ( ankle ) , as they were out - scored 38 - 25 in the second half . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could to keep the Nuggets in this game , but it just was n't enough . He scored a game - high of 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) to go along with nine assists and six rebounds in 46 minutes . Danilo Gallinari had a nice game as well , scoring 21 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) and grabbing nine rebounds . Wilson Chandler was a huge spark off the bench for the Nuggets . He had 25 points and 10 rebounds in 36 minutes of action . Kenneth Faried had seven points ( 3 - 4 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 24 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic had 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) in 25 minutes , while Jameer Nelson had five points ( 2 - 6 FG ) . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Will Barton , who had eight points and 12 rebounds in 27 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home to take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going only 1 - of - 3 from beyond the arc , but still finished with nine assists , four steals and four steals in 35 minutes . Despite the loss , the Bucks have now won four of their last five games . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday , when they travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls in their next game .
 The Indiana Pacers defeated the Boston Celtics , 100 - 98 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 1 - 3 ) were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , but it was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 12 points , as it was a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half . The Pacers actually led for the majority of the game , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Rebounding was the key difference , with Indiana winning that battle , 53 - 49 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Pacers recording 18 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Celtics committed 19 turnovers to just 20 assists . Boston was led by Isaiah Thomas , as he tallied 27 points , seven assists and two steals . Avery Bradley finished second on the team , totaling 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jae Crowder was the only other Celtic in double figures , totaling 12 points and six rebounds . Marcus Smart was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . Paul George led the Pacers in scoring , collecting 26 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , zero steals and two blocks . Jordan Hill finished with 16 points and 10 rebounds on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Monta Ellis amassed 13 points , eight assists and five rebounds . George Hill and Rodney Stuckey each scored 7 points a piece , while C.J . Miles led the bench with 0 points and zero rebounds . Boston will look to get out of this rut on Friday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets . Indiana will be in action again on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game .

The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who went 9 - 19 from the field and 4 - 6 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while adding 10 rebounds , three assists and one block , in 30 minutes . Harrison Barnes chipped in 16 points and five rebounds , while Seth Curry and Deron Williams added 13 and 12 points , respectively , in 31 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Mavericks will head home to go up against the Bulls on Friday .

The Knicks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 32 - 30 in the first quarter , but the Lakers battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Knicks were able to out - score the Lakers 34 - 37 in the final quarter to seal the win and end the Lakers ' three - game losing streak .  The Utah Jazz ( 20 - 19 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 20 - 33 ) 127 - 94 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans went 46 percent from both the floor and 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans were also out - rebounded 48 - 37 , which may have been the difference in the game , as the Jazz dominated that battle down low . Rudy Gobert had a monster double - double , finishing with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 16 rebounds , while also recording three assists and two blocks . He 's now averaging 16 rebounds on the season . Derrick Favors also had a double - doubles , finishing 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and grabbing seven rebounds in 25 minutes of action . Gordon Hayward finished with 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds and three assists in 26 minutes , while George Hill chipped in 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG 2 - 6 3PT , 5 - 8 FT ) of his own . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pelicans was E'Twaun Moore , who finished with 13 points in 19 minutes . Despite the loss , the Jazz have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to climb up the Western Conference standings . They 're currently in second place in the Northwest Division , and have a hold of the eighth seed in the conference as well . They head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Pelicans are currently in fourth place , and are just a half - game behind the eighth - place Rockets . They have two days off before taking on the Heat in Miami on Saturday night .

 The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors , 115 - 101 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . The Cavaliers ( 3 - 3 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . In fact , Cleveland held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they held the lead for well over 40 minutes of this game . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Cavaliers recording 24 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Warriors committed 14 turnovers to just 19 assists . Golden State actually dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 35 - 35 . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Cleveland going 13 - of - 28 from long distance , while Golden State went just 8 - of- 29 . The Warriors ( 3 3 ) have now lost three of their last four games , with this being one of the worst losses of the season . Stephen Curry led the way for Golden State , as he tallied 30 points , two rebounds and one assists . Klay Thompson was second on the team , finishing with 25 points , three rebounds , two steals and one assist . Draymond Green recorded a triple - double , totaling eight points , 10 rebounds and six assists . No other player scored in double figures for the Warriors , as the team shot just 40 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . LeBron James did all he could to keep the Cavaliers in this game , accumulating 41 points , eight rebounds , 11 assists , four steals and three blocks in the win . Kyrie Irving was second among starters , finishing the game with 23 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Tristan Thompson recorded a double double , amassing 15 points and 16 rebounds . J.R. Smith was the only other Cavalier to score in double digits , totaling 14 points and four rebounds . Cleveland will look to build off this win on Tuesday , when they host the Indiana Pacers for their next game .

They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Cavaliers 30 - 20 in the second quarter . Detroit shot 45 percent from the field and 57 percent from three - point range , while holding Cleveland to 38 percent shooting from the floor and 39 percent from beyond the arc . They also out - rebounded the Cavaliers 47 - 45 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . He did have eight turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the point guard . Tristan Thompson was the lone starter to score in double figures for the Cavaliers , as his seven points ( 2 - 4 FG ) and 10 rebounds were n't enough to keep up with the Pistons ' big men . The only other Cleveland player to score more than 51 points was Channing Frye , who came off the bench to score 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , to go along with one assists and zero steals in 18 minutes . The Cavs are off until Friday , when they 'll return home to host the Brooklyn Nets . Andre Drummond was the Pistons best player on the night . He finished with 11 points , 17 rebounds , four assists and two blocked shots in 28 minutes . It was his second double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 17 rebounds per game . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was second on the team in scoring , finishing with a team - high of 18 points , while adding three rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block in 39 minutes . Jon Leuer and Marcus Morris were the other two starters in double - figures with 13 and 15 points , respectively . Tobias Harris led the way for the Pistons in scoring with 21 points , six rebounds and four assists , while Reggie Jackson chipped in 13 points and six assists . Detroit 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

Marcus Smart struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 11 from the floor , but still finished with three points , three assists , one rebounds and two steals in 30 minutes . Al Horford was the high - point man for the Hawks , finishing with 17 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , to go along with five rebounds , five blocks and two assists in 31 minutes . Kyle Korver added 17 points and seven rebounds , while Jeff Teague added 13 points , six assists , one rebound , two steals , one block and one three - pointer in 27 minutes . Paul Millsap finished with four points , seven rebounds and four blocks , while Kent Bazemore added five points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals in 29 minutes . Dennis Schroder was the only other player to score in double digits for Atlanta , as he finished with 8 points on 3 - 6 shooting , including 0 - 0 from long range , in just 20 minutes . Game 3 will take place in Atlanta on Tuesday . The series now heads back to Boston for Game 3 , which will be held at TD Garden .

With the win , the Hornets improved to 20 - 16 and are in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again on Wednesday , when they 'll take on the Detroit Pistons .
 The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 28 - 16 ) 112 - 94 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 55 percent from three - point range , while the Clippers went 45 percent from both the floor and 31 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Clippers 44 - 34 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The Clippers were led by Chris Paul , who went 9 - for - 17 from the floor to score 23 points , while also adding 11 assists and four rebounds . He 's now averaging 23 points and 11 assists on the season . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 9 FT ) and 13 rebounds , giving him his second double - doubles in a row . It was his third straight double - digit rebound game . J.J. Redick added 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , two rebounds and two assists . The only other player to score in double figures for the Clippers was Jamal Crawford , who finished with three points ( 1 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) in 19 minutes off the bench . Jonas Valanciunas led the Raptors in scoring with 20 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) to go along with eight rebounds and one blocked shot . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high six times , converting on all six of those attempts . Kyle Lowry was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 21 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , four rebounds and six assists . DeMar DeRozan finished with 18 points and four rebounds , while Terrence Ross chipped in 18 points , five rebounds and four steals as well . The bench was huge for the Raptors , as Cory Joseph , Patrick Patterson and Lucas Nogueira all scored in double digits . Patterson finished with 20 points , three assists and one steals , while Jonas Valancunas finished with 10 points and eight rebounds . With the win , the Raptors improved to 19 - 8 at home and are now tied with the Boston Celtics for the third seed in the Eastern Conference . They 'll head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Clippers are off until Friday night , when they 'll travel to Boston to take care of business against the Celtics .
 The Sacramento Kings ( 9 - 5 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 7 - 6 ) 99 - 89 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Kings were able to hold off the Pelicans in this one , despite being out - scored 26 - 19 in the fourth quarter . The Pelicans came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but it was n't enough to get it done . DeMarcus Cousins and Omri Casspi were the only two players to score in double figures for the Kings . Cousins finished with 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and five assists , while Casspi added 22 points and four rebounds of his own . Ramon Sessions had 15 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , six assists and three rebounds . The only other player to score double digits for Sacramento was Ben McLemore , who finished with 10 points , two rebounds and one assist , in 29 minutes . Tyreke Evans led the way for the Pelicans . He went 10 - for - 17 from the field to score 22 points , while also adding seven rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 38 minutes . Anthony Davis finished with 14 points and nine rebounds , while Jrue Holiday chipped in 11 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes . Ryan Anderson was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 20 points , five rebounds and zero assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . Next , the Pelicans will look to get back on track on Friday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road . This marks the Kings ' fourth win in five games , as they continue to climb up the Western Conference standings . They 'll look to keep it rolling on Friday against the Phoenix Suns .

The Cavaliers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Magic 59 - 48 in the first half alone . Tobias Harris finished with 24 points and eight rebounds , while Nikola Vucevic recorded a double - double with 22 points ( 11 - 21 FG ) and 15 rebounds , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Orlando will stay home and play the Nets on Friday .
 The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 50 - 27 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 46 - 31 ) 99 - 94 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they took care of business in the final 12 minutes to pull out the win . In fact , Cleveland held the lead for the final three quarters , as the Bulls never led by more than seven points in the entire game . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with the Cavaliers recording 24 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 16 turnovers to just 28 assists . The Bulls were led by Mike Dunleavy , who finished with 24 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) , five rebounds and four assists in 33 minutes . Aaron Brooks was the only other Bulls player in double figures , as he finished with 17 points , six assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Jimmy Butler finished with 16 points , four rebounds , five assists and three steals in 42 minutes . Pau Gasol recorded 12 points , four rebounds and nine assists in 31 minutes , while Nikola Mirotic chipped in 12 points and 10 rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Cavaliers will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday when they take on the Pacers in Indiana . Chicago , on the other hand , will try to end their losing streak when they play the Pistons in Detroit on Friday .

 The Los Angeles Lakers ( 14 - 41 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 28 - 33 ) 118 - 111 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Celtics came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but the Lakers had other ideas . In fact , they outscored the Celtics 33 - 20 in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The Lakers shot 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while the Celtics shot 43 percent and just 24 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Lakers recording 22 assists to just 17 turnovers and the Celtics committing 16 turnovers to just 27 assists . This marks the second straight loss for the Celtics , as they continue to slide down the standings . Isaiah Thomas led the team in scoring , as he tallied 23 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and five rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench . Brandon Bass finished with 15 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) , five rebounds and two blocked shots in 40 minutes , while Marcus Smart chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 9 FG ) and five boards in 31 minutes . Next up , the Celtics will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while The Lakers will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
 The Golden State Warriors ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 2 ) 120 - 111 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Game 4 of the Western Conference finals to advance to the NBA Finals for the second straight season . The Warriors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game . Golden State outscored the Thunder 39 - 34 in the final quarter to seal the win and advance to a second straight NBA Finals . Kevin Durant led all scorers with 40 points ( 12 - 31 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 13 - 13 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in 45 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 31 points ( 11 - 28 FG ) , eight assists , seven rebounds and five steals in 41 minutes . He 's now averaging 33 points , 8 assists and 7 rebounds on the season . Draymond Green recorded a double - double with 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and 13 rebounds , while Andrew Bogut added 15 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 30 minutes . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors as he finished with a game - high 31 points , while Klay Thompson added 27 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 2 - 9 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) of his own . The only other player to score in double digits for Golden State was Andre Iguodala , who chipped in 8 points in just thirty-four minutes off the bench . The series now heads back to Oklahoma City for Game 5 on Friday night . The Thunder will look to even the series at two games apiece .
 The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 22 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . Memphis was able to make a run in the fourth quarter , however , outscoring the Thunder 34 - 20 , but it was n't enough to overcome a big fourth quarter from Oklahoma City . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 , currently in third place in the Western Conference ) were led by Russell Westbrook 's 38 - point , 13 - rebound , 12 - assist triple - double , which also included three steals and a game - high 13 rebounds . The All-Star point guard also dished out a team - high three steals . Oklahoma City was led by a pair of 16 - point efforts from Steven Adams and Enes Kanter , with the former adding 12 rebounds , two assists , a steal and two blocks , and the latter hauling in eight boards and recording two assists and a steal . Victor Oladipo and Domantas Sabonis combined for just seven points on 3 - of - 14 shooting from the field . Marc Gasol led the way for the Grizzlies with 31 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Mike Conley was right behind him with 18 points , while Zach Randolph led the bench with 16 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal . Chandler Parsons was the only other Memphis player in double figures , posting 12 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steals . Tony Allen supplied 11 points , four boards , two blocks and zero assist . JaMychal Green went scoreless over 24 minutes before exiting with a sprained ankle and did not return . Next up , the Grizzlies visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday night , while the Thunder visit the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday night .

The Pelicans came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 42 - 23 in the first quarter alone . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 59 percent from beyond the arc , while the Sixers finished at 40 percent from both the floor and 33 percent from deep . Anthony Davis did all he could to keep the Pelicans hanging around , as he finished with 31 points ( 12 - 30 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , 16 rebounds and two blocked shots , in 35 minutes . Jrue Holiday finished with 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and nine assists , in 30 minutes , while Tyreke Evans chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 5 - 8 FT ) of his own , along with 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 29 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pelicans was Buddy Hield , who finished with 10 points , in 21 minutes . The Sixers were led by Gerald Henderson , who went 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while adding three rebounds , one assist and one block , in 27 minutes . Jahlil Okafor finished with 11 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and zero steal , in 25 minutes . Nerlens Noel came up big for the Sixers , with 4 points ( 2 - 2 FG ) , three rebounds and zero blocked shot , in 7 minutes . Joel Embiid was the only other starter in double figures , with 11 , while Robert Covington added 11 points and eight rebounds , in 34 minutes . Sergio Rodriguez finished with nine points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 7 3PT ) , two rebounds and three assists , while T.J. McConnell added 10 points and five rebounds , as a reserve , in 17 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . The 76ers will stay home and go up against the Toronto Raptors on Friday .
 The Portland Trail Blazers ( 28 - 35 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 23 - 41 ) 114 - 108 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 27 - 17 in the first quarter . The Sixers were able to make a run in the second quarter though , cutting the lead to just three points , but the Trail Blazers were n't done there , as they out - scored the Sixers 21 - 19 in the third quarter to seal the win . The Blazers shot 46 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while the Sixers shot 44 percent from beyond the arc and 38 percent from long range . Dario Saric led the Sixers in scoring with 28 points ( 11 - 16 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 41 minutes . Robert Covington finished with 24 points and 13 rebounds , while Jahlil Okafor added 16 points and eight rebounds , in 29 minutes . Nerlens Noel chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , three rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes off the bench . Jusuf Nurkic was the player of the game , as he led the way for the Blazers . He went 9 - for - 18 from the floor and 10 - 13 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding 20 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and six blocks , in 38 minutes . Damian Lillard struggled shooting the ball , going just 6 - of - 21 for 24 points , four rebounds and four assists , while C.J . McCollum finished with 23 points and three assists , in 42 minutes . Allen Crabbe was the only other Trail Blazer in double figures , with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) and four rebounds in 24 minutes . The 76ers will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they play the Utah Jazz on the road in their next scheduled game . Meanwhile , the Blazers will stay home and go up against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
 The Chicago Bulls ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 0 - 3 ) 113 - 106 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . Derrick Rose and Giannis Antetokounmpo were the only two players to score in double figures for the Bulls . Rose finished with a game - high 34 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt ) , to go along with eight assists , five rebounds and three steals , in 48 minutes . Jimmy Butler followed up with 24 points ( 8 - 20 FG ) , three rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks , in 53 minutes . Pau Gasol finished with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 14 rebounds , along with five assists , two blocks and one steal , in 41 minutes . The Bulls shot 45 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while the Bucks shot 42 percent , from the floor and 32 percent from long range . The Bucks were led by Giannis Anthony-Konkonmpo , who finished with 25 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 0 - 8 3Pd ) , 12 rebounds and two blocked shots , in 51 minutes . Michael Carter-Williams added 19 points ( 9 - 21 FG ) nine assists , zero rebounds , four blocks and two steals , while Khris Middleton chipped in 18 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Greg Monroe came up big off the bench , with 15 points and 14 boards , in 39 minutes , while Michael Beasley added 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 1 - 4 FT ) , two steals and one block , in 21 minutes . With the win , the Bulls improved to 3 - 1 on the season . They 're off to a 2 - 2 start and will look to continue their winning ways on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Bucks are off until Friday night , when they 'll look to get back on track against the New York Knicks .

They were able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the way though , as the Wizards were n't able to get it within striking distance in the second half . The Heat were able to hold off the Nets in this one , as they outscored them 34 - 19 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Nets came into this game as a double - digit underdog , but were out - scored 34 - 22 in the third quarter , which allowed the Heat to run away with the game in the final 12 minutes . Miami shot 45 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range , while the Nets shot 43 percent of their shots from the floor and 40 percent from beyond the arc . This was a big win for the Heat , who have now won three of their last four games . Tyler Johnson was the player of the game , as he led the team with 18 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and three steals in 36 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic was n't far behind , finishing with 21 points , four rebounds and five assists of his own . Rodney McGruder recorded 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and four steals . Up next , the Heat will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Brooklyn will stay home Friday and play the Trail Blazers .
 The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Boston Celtics , 128 - 122 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . The Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Cavaliers ( 5 - 0 ) had other ideas . In fact , Cleveland led for the entirety of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with the Cavs recording 24 assists to just eight turnovers , while the Celtics committed eight turnovers to just 25 assists . The Cavaliers also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 42 - 39 . Boston was led by Isaiah Thomas , who tallied 30 points , three rebounds and six assists . Avery Bradley was second on the team , totaling 26 points and 10 rebounds . Jaylen Brown was the only other Boston player in double figures , totaling 19 points , five rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Tyler Zeller totaled 11 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , zero blocks and two steals . Marcus Smart led the bench with 14 points , two rebounds and two assists . LeBron James was the player of the game , as he accumulated 30 points and 12 assists on 12 - of - 22 shooting . Kevin Love was n't far behind , finishing with 26 points , eight rebounds and zero assists . Kyrie Irving finished with 23 points , four rebounds and six assists . Tristan Thompson recorded a 15 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . Channing Frye was a nice spark off the bench , totaling 11 points and one rebounds . Cleveland 's next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while Boston will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday .

The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 23 - 24 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way though , as they went on to out - score the Pistons 26 - 19 in the second quarter to pull away and eventually pull away for the win . They shot 34 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons went 38 percent ( 15 - for - 63 ) from the floor and just 15 percent ( 4 - of - 28 ) from long range . With the win , the Hornets improved to 12 - 8 at home and are now 2 - 2 in their last three games . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Pistons , who 've now lost four of their last five . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday , when they take on the New York Knicks on the road .

The Clippers ( 5 - 3 ) have been dominant at home this season , and they did n't disappoint in this blowout win over the Suns . The key for Los Angeles was their defense , as they held Phoenix to 38 percent shooting from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 24 assists to just 20 turnovers , while the Suns committed 10 turnovers to just 26 assists . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as the Clippers outscored the Suns 42 - 23 in that 12 - minute stretch . Los Angeles also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 47 - 43 . The Suns ( 5 - 5 ) had to play this game without Devin Booker and Eric Bledsoe and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Isaiah Thomas was the lone bright spot for Phoenix , as he led the team with 19 points and 2 rebounds off the bench . Up next , the Thunder will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Suns will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc , while the Lakers finished at 39 percent shooting from the floor and just 38 percent from deep . The Blazers also out - rebounded the Lakers 50 - 38 , giving them even more of an advantage on the glass . The Lakers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who each finished with 25 points and 25 points , respectively . Lillard added eight rebounds , six assists and zero steals , but shot just 7 - of - 21 on the night . He did , however , go a perfect 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line , so it was n't all bad for the point guard , as he added eight assists and eight rebounds in 31 minutes of action . Collum on the other hand went 10 - of- 18 from the free throw line and finished with a team - high of 25 points . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Maurice Harkless , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds , three blocked shots and one assist in 32 minutes . Up next , the Trail Blazers will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Los Angeles will stay home and play the Clippers on Friday .

They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , but the Knicks battled back to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . Augustin turned in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding one boards , and the latter dishing out seven assists . Jeff Green paced the bench with a 17 - point effort , which included a pair of three - pointers . Nikola Vucevic supplied seven points , five assists and four rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench as well . The Magic remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well ; they head to Miami to take on the Heat on Friday night .

The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 17 - 16 in the first quarter and 29 - 17 in the second quarter . They went on to out - score the Mavericks 29 - 18 in the third quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . Orlando shot 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Mavericks shot just 34 percent ( 34 - for - 92 ) from the floor and 46 percent ( 46 percent ) from three - point range . They were also out - rebounded 50 - 34 by the Magic . Mario Hezonja led the Magic in scoring , with 0 points and zero assists in 0 minutes , while C.J . Watson added 9 points and 0 rebounds , along with zero blocks and zero blocked shots , in just 19 minutes off of the bench , in his second game back from a one - game absence . Next up , the Magic will head to Miami to take on the Heat on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . The Warriors ( 4 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . In fact , Golden State held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they led by double - digits for the final 30 - plus minutes . Golden State shot 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding Oklahoma City to 40 percent shooting and 37 percent from long range . The Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to continue their hot start to the season , and they did just that . Toronto jumped out to a 24 - 20 lead after one quarter and never looked back , as they never relinquished the lead after that . In fact , the Raptors led by double - digits for the entirety of the second and third quarters , as Houston never led by more than seven points in the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with the Raptors recording 28 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Rockets committed 26 turnovers to just 29 assists . Toronto shot 49 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range , while holding Houston to 49 percent shooting and 33 percent from long range . The Bucks shot 47 percent from the floor and 43 percent from three - point range , while the Hawks shot 48 percent ( 13 - 30 ) from deep and 35 percent from long range , but the Bucks out - rebounded the Hawks 43 - 32 and forced them into 17 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own .  The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 127 - 89 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Cavaliers ( 34 - 22 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest as the Eastern Conference 's hottest team , having won four of their last five games . They were led by LeBron James ' 28 points , which he supplemented with six assists , five rebounds and a steal . Kyrie Irving was right behind him with 25 points , seven assists , two rebounds and zero steals . J.R. Smith was next with 15 points , while Tristan Thompson led the bench with 6 . Kyle Korver was productive in a reserve role as well with eight points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . John Wall and Nene Hilario paced the Wizards with matching 18 - point tallies , while Paul Pierce and Marcin Gortat supplied matching eight - point totals . Otto Porter supplied nine points , and Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the second unit with a modest eight points . Bradley Beal was productive as a reserve with seven points , six boards and two assists . The Wizards were out - rebounded by a 43 - 42 margin , and committed 17 turnovers . The Cavs head back home to face off with the Chicago Bulls on Friday night , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday evening as well .

 The Detroit Pistons defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 104 - 88 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 6 - 5 ) have been dominant at home this season , and they did n't disappoint in this blowout win over a shorthanded Thunder team . Detroit shot 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while holding Oklahoma City to 38 percent shooting and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The key for the Pistons was the rebounding , as they snatched down 47 boards to the Thunder 's 51 . The Thunder ( 6 5 ) had to play this game without Kevin Durant and Serge Ibaka and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Russell Westbrook did all he could to keep the Thunder in the game though , as he tallied 33 points , 15 rebounds and eight assists in the defeat . He also added eight assists and seven turnovers . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player in double figures , totaling 10 points and three rebounds off the bench . Victor Oladipo shot just 4 - of - 17 and finished with nine points , two assists and one rebound in 23 minutes of action . Tobias Harris led the Pistons in scoring , dropping 22 points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Aron Baynes was second on the team , totaling 20 points and eight rebounds . Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope each scored 17 points a piece , with the former adding four rebounds and three assists , and the latter providing four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jon Leuer led the bench with 8 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Detroit will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks . Meanwhile , the Thunder will be off until Sunday , when they host the Charlotte Hornets for their next game .
 The Detroit Pistons ( 9 - 10 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 10 - 8 ) 112 - 89 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Pistons came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 33 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They shot 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from beyond the arc , while the Hornets shot just 40 percent of their shots . Tobias Harris led the way for the Pistons , scoring 24 points on 9 - of - 12 shooting , while also adding seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and six assists , in 32 minutes . Marcus Morris added 18 points and four rebounds , while Ish Smith chipped in 13 points , three assists and two rebounds , in 25 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Detroit was Jon Leuer , who finished with 12 points ( 12 - 5 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , in 32 minutes off the bench . For the Hornets , Kemba Walker did everything he could to keep the Hornets in this game , as he finished with a team - high of 23 points , to go along with four assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes . Cody Zeller recorded a double - double , with eight points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with one steal and one block , in 28 minutes . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist added 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , four rebounds and one blocked shot , while Nicolas Batum finished with 11 rebounds , five assists and no turnovers , in 30 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . The Hornets will look to bounce back , as they travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
 The Memphis Grizzlies ( 15 - 21 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 15 - 33 ) 115 - 96 on Monday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 57 percent from beyond the arc , while the Suns finished at 42 percent shooting from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , going off for a game - high of 38 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 7 - 10 3Pt ) , to go along with nine assists and six rebounds , in 33 minutes . Marc Gasol finished with 18 points , seven rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes , while Zach Randolph chipped in 18 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , zero rebounds and five assists , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who finished with 22 points ( 6 - 20 FG , 10 - 12 FT ) , six rebounds and one steals , in 39 minutes . Marquese Chriss added 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 14 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3 Pt ) , five rebounds , four assists and two blocked shots , in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Suns was T.J. Warren , who added six points , in 21 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set , as the Suns will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Kings .
 The Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 11 ) 113 - 111 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 25 in the first quarter . The Knicks were able to make a run in the second quarter though , cutting the lead to just three points , but the Suns were n't done there , as they went on to out - score the Knicks by 16 points in the third quarter to seal the win . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Suns , scoring a game - high 31 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , to go along with eight assists , six rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double , with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 23 rebounds , in 41 minutes . Marquese Chriss finished with 14 points and 12 rebounds , while P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points , seven rebounds , three steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Devin Booker struggled shooting , going 3 - 16 from the field and 1 - 5 from the three - point line , but finished with 12 points and one rebound , in 36 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis led the Knicks in scoring , with 36 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 7 - 4 FT , 6 - 7 FT ) . He also had eight rebounds and three blocked shots , in 42 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for New York was Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 13 . Justin Holiday came up big off the bench , as he finished with 8 points , 1 rebounds , three assists and zero steal , in 25 minutes . Up next , the Suns will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Knicks will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
 The Chicago Bulls ( 28 - 29 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 37 - 20 ) 104 - 103 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 25 - 22 in the first quarter alone . The Celtics were able to make a run in the second quarter , but were unable to hold off the Bulls in the third quarter , where they out - scored the Celtics 25 - 23 . Jimmy Butler led the way for the Bulls , scoring a game - high 29 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and four rebounds , in 40 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Taj Gibson was the other big contributor for the Chicago offense , as he finished with 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) , eight rebounds and two assists , in 28 minutes . Robin Lopez chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 0 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and zero rebounds , while Nikola Mirotic added 0 points ( 0 - 13 ) and a career - high eight rebounds off the bench , in 0 minutes . For the Celtics , Isaiah Thomas did everything he could to keep his team in the game . He shot 8 - 18 from the field and 4 - 9 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding seven assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes . It was his second game in a row with at least 20 points and seven assists . Jonas Jerebko was the only other player to score in double figures for the Celtics . He finished with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , seven rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes , while Marcus Smart started at point guard and finished with five points ( 1 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 3 Pt ) , three assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 33 minutes . Al Horford struggled with his shot , going 3 - 10 from the floor and 1 - for - 5 from beyond the arc to score seven points , in 27 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Celtics will head home to go up against the Pistons on Friday .
 The Utah Jazz ( 23 - 25 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 31 ) 85 - 81 on Wednesday at EnergySolutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz were able to hold off the Nuggets in this one , despite being out - rebounded 41 - 38 . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 37 percent from the field and 22 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz went 45 percent from both the floor and just 23 percent from deep . Despite the loss , the Jazz were still able to force the Nuggets into 14 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Utah recording 14 assists to 14 turnovers and the Nuggets committing 14 turnovers to just 11 assists . Despite shooting just 5 - for - 16 from the three - point line , Danilo Gallinari led the Nuggets with 24 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , while also adding two rebounds and one steal . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Kenneth Faried was the only other Nugget to reach double figures in points , finishing with 14 points and five rebounds . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , combining for 40 points and 12 rebounds over that span . Gary Harris and Will Barton were the other two Nuggets in double figures , with Harris scoring 11 points and grabbing six rebounds , while Barton scored 10 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . Gordon Hayward led the way for the Jazz , finishing the game with 16 points , five assists and two rebounds . Derrick Favors recorded a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double , while Rudy Gobert recorded 12 points and five rebounds . Favors has been on a tear of late , averaging 20 points and 10 rebounds over his last three games . Raul Neto was the other Jazz starter in double - figures , finishing this zero with 10 points , four rebounds and four assists . The only other player to reach 2 points was Trey Burke , who came off the Utah bench to score two points in 16 minutes . Next up , the Nuggets will travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while Utah will head to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .
 The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 33 - 27 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 16 - 42 ) 108 - 101 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Thunder were able to hold off the Lakers in this one , as they out - scored the Lakers 29 - 24 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Lakers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but it was n't enough to escape with a win . Oklahoma City shot 41 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers shot 36 percent from beyond the arc and 36 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Thunder recording 21 assists to just nine turnovers and the Lakers committing nine turnovers to just 21 assists . Serge Ibaka led the way for the Thunder , as he tallied 18 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , 14 rebounds and three blocked shots in 35 minutes . D.J . Augustin was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists in 41 minutes . Enes Kanter recorded a 16 - point , 15 - rebound double - double , while also adding five assists and a steal in 29 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Oklahoma City was Anthony Morrow , who chipped in 1 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , one rebounds and one assist in 21 minutes off the bench . For the Lakers , Lou Williams was the player of the game . He led the team with 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , six rebounds and eight assists in 32 minutes . Jordan Clarkson finished with 12 points , two rebounds , four assists and one block in 34 minutes . Carlos Boozer started in place of the injured D'Angelo Russell and finished with eight points ( 4 - 11 FG ) and six rebounds in 19 minutes . Julius Randle recorded a 14 - point and 11 - rebound triple - double off the pine , while Wayne Ellington and Ryan Kelly scored 12 points each . Next up for the Lakers is a road matchup against the Golden State Warriors on Friday . Meanwhile , the Thunder will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second game of their current four - game road trip .

The Hawks came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Nets 36 - 23 in the first quarter and 41 - 15 in the second quarter . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets finished at just 37 percent shooting from the floor and 30 percent from three - point range . Jeff Teague struggled shooting the ball , as he went 0 - for - 5 ( 0 - 5 FG ) , but still finished with 13 assists and no turnovers . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with 19 points and seven rebounds , in 35 minutes . Deron Williams added 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 1Pt ) , five rebounds , zero assists and four steals , in 27 minutes . Up next , the Hawks will head home Wednesday to take on the Pistons , while Brooklyn will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Pistons .
 The Indiana Pacers ( 30 - 34 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 34 - 31 ) 109 - 103 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers were able to hold off the Bucks in this one , despite being out - scored 31 - 21 in the fourth quarter . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while the Pacers went 49 percent ( 49 percent ) from the floor and 41 percent from long range . Despite out - rebounding the Bucks 48 - 48 , the Pacers were also able to force the Bucks into 15 turnovers , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Michael Carter-Williams led the Bucks with 28 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) , eight rebounds and four steals in 40 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Ersan Ilyasova recorded his second double - double of the season , finishing with 19 points and 10 rebounds in 35 minutes . Zaza Pachulia finished with 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 34 minutes . Khris Middleton finished with 18 points ( 6 - 21 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , four rebounds and one assist in 45 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bucks was Giannis Antetokounmpo , who finished with 12 points ( 0 - 14 FG , 4 - 14 FG ) , six rebounds and three assists in 35 mintues . Paul George was the player of the game , as he led the Pacers in scoring with 25 points , to go along with six rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 37 minutes off the bench . George Hill finished with 17 points , five assists and four rebounds , while C.J . Miles chipped in 2 points and zero rebounds in 7 minutes . Rodney Stuckey was the only other Pacer to reach double figures in points . He had 17 points and 15 rebounds , in 33 minutes . Ian Mahinmi finished with eight points , 10 rebounds , four blocks and one steals , in 29 minutes . Next up for the Pacers is a road matchup against the New York Knicks on Wednesday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Bucks will look to end their three - game losing streak when they take on the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .

The Warriors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they took care of business in the final minutes to secure their 53rd win of the season . Golden State shot 48 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range , while holding the Lakers to 46 percent shooting from the floor and 53 percent from beyond the arc . Wesley Johnson finished with a team - high 16 points and five rebounds , in 39 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will stay at home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Lakers will head home to go up against the Nuggets on Friday .

The Raptors came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Magic 36 - 27 in the first quarter , but the Magic responded with a 33 - 15 run in the second quarter to take the lead and eventually run away with the win . The Magic shot 53 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 43 percent from beyond the arc and 43 percent from long range . Despite out - rebounding the Raptors 40 - 40 , the Magic were able to out - score the Raptors 36 - 40 in the paint . Watson added 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and one assist , in 34 minutes . He went 9 - for - 18 from the floor , 6 - 9 from deep and 9 - 12 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding eight assists and five rebounds , in 38 minutes . Terrence Ross was a big reason the Raptors got off to a hot start and finished with 17 points and three steals , in 28 minutes off of the bench , while DeMarre Carroll started in place of the injured Cory Joseph , who played just 17 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home to take on the New York Knicks on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams , as they 'll look to extend their winning streak to four . Meanwhile , The Magic will look to keep their winning ways going against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
