The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday .
 The Toronto Raptors ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 0 - 3 ) 113 - 103 in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Verizon Center to take a 3 - 2 lead in the series . DeMar DeRozan led all scorers with 40 points ( 14 - 23 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 16 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 37 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) , three assists , one rebound , four steals and two three - pointers , in 36 minutes , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Raptors shot 56 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards shot 58 percent ( 30 - 67 ) from the floor and 30 percent from long range . John Wall finished with a game - high 33 points ( 13 - 19 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) to go with 11 assists , five rebounds and three steals , while Otto Porter , Jr. added 23 points and 13 rebounds in 38 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 43 minutes . Bradley Beal added 15 points on 5 - 13 shooting , in 39 minutes . Game 4 will take place in Washington on Tuesday .
 The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 1 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 7 - 3 ) 121 - 117 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 30 - 25 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Raptors by 12 in the second quarter and 30 points in the third quarter to secure the win . The Cavs shot 53 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while the Raptors shot 48 percent from both the field , 45 percent from deep and 45 percent on their end . The Raptors were led by Kyle Lowry , who went 11 - for - 23 from the floor and 4 - for- 8 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding nine assists . He 's now averaging 24 points and 9 assists on the year . DeMar DeRozan was n't far behind , finishing with 26 points ( 10 - 27 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) , six rebounds and four assists . It was his second straight game with at least 26 points and six rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and nine rebounds , while Norman Powell got the start at small forward and finished with 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) , three rebounds , three assists , zero steal and one block . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was Terrence Ross , who finished with 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) in 25 minutes off the bench . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , as he finished with 28 points and 15 assists , to go along with nine rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 24 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals , while Tristan Thompson chipped in 15 points and 11 rebounds in 30 minutes . Kevin Love struggled shooting , but still finished with 19 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and three blocks , in 35 minutes . Channing Frye was the only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points . He finished with 21 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , in just 20 minutes . With the win , the Cavaliers have now won all three games against the Raptors this season . Up next , the Cavs will head home to take on the Pacers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back , while Toronto will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers Friday .
 The San Antonio Spurs ( 46 - 9 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 45 ) 119 - 113 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Spurs were able to hold off the Lakers in this one , as they out - scored the Lakers 34 - 38 in the fourth quarter to seal the victory . This game was tight throughout , as there were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The shooting was the difference in the game , with the Spurs shooting 55 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers shot 49 percent on their end . Tony Parker led the Spurs in scoring , as he tallied 25 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) , six assists and one rebound , in 32 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds , while also adding three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 35 minutes . Tim Duncan finished with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and 13 rebounds , in 28 minutes , while Kyle Anderson chipped in 14 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 29 minutes . Manu Ginobili was the only other Spur in double figures , finishing with 15 points and seven assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who finished with a game - high 25 points on 10 - 25 shooting , along with four rebounds and three assists . Jordan Clarkson finished with 20 points and six assists , while Lou Williams added 21 points on 7 - 12 shooting , including 3 - 4 from deep . Julius Randle recorded a double - double , with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , 15 rebounds and zero assist , in 31 minutes . The only other Lakers player to reach double figures in points was Jordan Hill , who scored 10 points ( 2 - 7 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) . Up next , the Spurs will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , while Los Angeles will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
 The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 31 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 14 - 32 ) 114 - 107 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 32 - 29 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Timberwolves in the second quarter , where they out - scored them 31 - 18 , to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers , finishing with 25 points ( 11 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , nine assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block , in 38 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , six rebounds , two assists and two steals , while J.R. Smith added 11 points , two rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 35 minutes . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who went 11 - for - 16 from the field to score 26 points , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists , one block and one steal , in 30 minutes . Andrew Wiggins finished with 20 points , one rebound , two steals and one assist , in 39 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad was the only other player to score in double figures for the Timberwolves , as he finished with 10 points , three assists and three rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench . Ricky Rubio finished with four points , seven rebounds and 10 assists , while Nemanja Bjelica added 5 points and zero rebounds in 16 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will stay home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Timberwolves will head home to go up against the Bulls on Friday .
 The Golden State Warriors ( 45 - 8 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 33 - 23 ) 122 - 107 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from beyond the arc , while the Grizzlies finished at 39 percent from both the floor and 35 percent from deep . The Grizzlies were also out - rebounded by the Warriors 47 - 47 , giving the Warriors even more of an advantage in this one . Despite being out - scored in the paint , the Warriors were able to out - rebound the Grizzlies 34 - 34 and out - assist them 31 - 20 , giving them just enough of an edge to pull out the win . Klay Thompson was the player of the game , finishing with a game - high of 36 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 8 - 15 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with three assists and one rebound , in 38 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 24 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal , in 32 minutes , while Stephen Curry chipped in 18 points , five assists and four rebounds , in 35 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Warriors was Marreese Speights , who finished with 22 points , in 28 minutes off the bench . Draymond Green recorded a double - double , with four points and 10 assists , along with 11 rebounds , five blocked shots and ten steals , in 38 minutes . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , with 20 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) , nine assists and five rebounds . Marc Gasol finished with 17 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Zach Randolph was the only other Memphis player in double figures , as he finished with a team - high 17 points and 13 rebounds , while Tony Allen finished with 15 points , nine rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will look to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Golden State will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 10 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) 93 - 86 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Air Canada Centre to take a 1 - 1 series lead in the series . The Raptors were expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster fourth quarter to do so . The Wizards outscored the Raptors 17 - 14 in the fourth quarter and held them to just 14 points in the final 12 minutes to pull away for the win . Washington shot 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range , while holding Toronto to 38 percent shooting and 21 percent from long range . Paul Pierce led the way for the Wizards with 20 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , one steal and one block in 37 minutes . Nene added 12 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and 13 rebounds in 21 minutes , while Bradley Beal chipped in 16 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal in 48 minutes . John Wall finished with 10 points , six rebounds and eight assists in 44 minutes . Otto Porter , Jr. was a nice spark off the bench , as he contributed six points and 10 rebounds in 23 minutes . DeMar DeRozan was the high - point man for the Raptors , with 15 points on 6 - 20 shooting , 11 rebounds and six assists in 43 minutes . Kyle Lowry struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - 10 from the floor and 0 - 4 from beyond the arc , but still finished with seven points , eight rebounds and four assists in 33 minutes . Terrence Ross started in place of the injured Kyle Lowry and finished with six points , three rebounds and two blocked shots in 22 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other Raptor to score in double figures , finishing with six points and eight rebounds in 24 minutes . Toronto will look to get back on track in Game 2 on Tuesday , as they travel to Boston to take on the Celtics . Washington 's next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday .
 The Chicago Bulls ( 17 - 18 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 19 - 16 ) 118 - 111 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 25 - 23 in the first quarter and 36 - 24 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . The Hornets were able to make a run in the third quarter , cutting the lead to six points , but the Bulls responded with a 36 - 26 fourth quarter to pull away and secure the win . Jimmy Butler was the star of the game , as he scored a career - high 52 points ( 15 - 24 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 21 - 22 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes . The 52 points were a season - high for Butler , who has now scored at least 40 points in four of his last five games . Michael Carter-Williams finished with 10 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Doug McDermott added 11 points and one rebound , in 30 minutes . Bobby Portis chipped in 0 points and zero steals , in 0 minutes off the bench . Kemba Walker led the way for the Hornets , with 34 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 6 - 8 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds , while Nicolas Batum added 19 points , six rebounds and five assists . The only other player to score in double digits for Charlotte was Marco Belinelli , who finished with 15 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) and six rebounds , in 27 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Hornets will head home to go up against the Bucks on Friday .
 The Houston Rockets ( 51 - 22 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 41 - 31 ) 137 - 125 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets were able to hold off the Thunder in this one , despite being out - scored 37 - 24 in the fourth quarter . The Thunder had a chance to tie or win this game at the end of the third quarter , but the Rockets outscored the Thunder 34 - 29 in the final 12 minutes to pull away and secure the seven - point victory in front of their home crowd . Houston shot 63 percent from the field and 51 percent from three - point range , while the Thunder shot 37 percent from beyond the arc and 37 percent from long range . Despite out - rebounding the Rockets 36 - 36 , the Rockets were still able to force the Thunder into 16 turnovers , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . James Harden and Eric Gordon were the two Rockets starters who led the way in this game . Harden finished with 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 12 assists and five rebounds , while scoring 22 points in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 assists on the season . Eric Gordon on the other hand shot 7 - for - 13 from the floor and 4 - of - 9 from long distance to score 24 points , while also adding two rebounds and zero steals . Trevor Ariza had 24 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times , converting on six of those attempts . Coming off the bench , Lou Williams had a big game . He went off for 31 points and four assists , while shooting 11 - for- 15 on the night . The only other Houston player to reach double figures in points was Clint Capela , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) . For the Thunder , Russell Westbrook did everything he could to keep his team in the game , but it was n't enough . Westbrook finished with 39 points ( 13 - 24 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 10 - 16 FT ) to go along with 11 rebounds and 13 assists . It was his second triple - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists . He also recorded a season - high in assists with 13 . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player in double figures , as he finished with 23 points ( nine - 12 FG , 0 - 12 FG ) , four rebounds and two assists in 23 minutes . Victor Oladipo finished with 15 points , four assists and four rebounds in 29 minutes . Steven Adams and Taj Gibson chipped in with 11 and 12 points , respectively . Next , the Thunder will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in the second half of a back - to - back set .

The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 23 in the first quarter . The Knicks were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Jazz responded with a big third quarter to take the lead and eventually run away with the game . The key for Utah was their shooting , as they went 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while the Knicks finished at 48 percent shooting from the floor and 63 percent from beyond the arc . New York has now lost four of their last five games , with this loss being the worst of the bunch . They 'll look to get out of this slide on Wednesday , when they take on the Charlotte Hornets on the road . Utah 's next game will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .
 The Dallas Mavericks ( 38 - 20 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 22 - 32 ) 92 - 81 on Monday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks were able to hold off the Hornets in this one , despite being out - rebounded 47 - 47 . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 37 percent from the field and from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 28 percent from beyond the arc and 28 percent from deep . Monta Ellis led the Mavericks in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with four assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes . He 's now pushed his season averages to 18 points and 5 assists per game , as he 's been a big reason for the Mavericks ' success over recent weeks . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Tyson Chandler , who finished with 12 points ( 6 - 6 FG ) , seven rebounds and two blocked shots , in 33 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , after scoring 14 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and grabbing three rebounds in Saturday 's game against the Grizzlies . The other two players to reach the double - digit scoring mark for the Mavs were Dirk Nowitzki and Rajon Rondo , who each finished with eight points , zero assists and twelve rebounds , in 27 and 27 minutes , respectively . For the Hornets , Mo Williams was the high - point man with 22 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 3 - 11 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) . He also added three assists , one rebound and three steals , in 38 minutes . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist finished with 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and six rebounds , while Al Jefferson added eight points ( 4 - 16 FG ) but grabbed 17 rebounds , giving him his third double - doubles in the last four games . He was the only other Hornets player to score in double figures , as the other three starters combined to go just 4 - for - 21 from the floor . The bench was led by Jeremy Lamb , who went 6 - of - 8 from deep and 2 - of- 3 from the free throw line to score 15 points , while also adding three rebounds . He has been a nice spark off the bench for the Hornets as of late , averaging 14 points over his last five games . Cody Zeller was held scoreless in 27 minutes but did grab 10 rebounds and record a pair of steals and zero blocks , in his first game back after missing time with an ankle injury . The Mav 's next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Meanwhile , the Hornets will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Wednesday as well .
 The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their third win in a row and fourth win in their last five games . The key for Philadelphia was the shooting , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 49 percent from three - point range , while holding the Suns to 29 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Sixers recording 33 assists to 18 turnovers , while the Suns committed 15 turnovers to just 18 assists . Joel Embiid was the player of the game , as he tallied 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Nerlens Noel was second on the team in scoring , dropping 21 points off the bench . Sergio Rodriguez recorded a double - double , amassing eight points , eight rebounds and 11 assists . Gerald Henderson and Ersan Ilyasova were the only other Sixers to score in double figures , as each finished with 11 points . The Suns ( 4 - 10 ) had a tough task here without Devin Booker and Eric Bledsoe and they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to keep up with a hot Sixers team . Blessoe led the team with 27 points , five rebounds and six assists , while Booker finished with 10 points , one rebound and two steals . Alex Len recorded nine points and seven rebounds in just 25 minutes of action . Brandon Knight led the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . Next up for Phoenix is a road matchup against the New York Knicks on Friday . The 76ers will look to continue their winning ways against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday in New York .

The Cavaliers were up 30 - 19 after the first quarter , but the Hawks battled back to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Cavaliers were able to out - score the Hawks 30 - 23 in the final period to seal the deal and take a 10 - point lead in front of their home crowd . Smith added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 7 3PT , 0 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Atlanta shot just 38 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . Game 2 is scheduled for Wednesday at 8:0 PM Eastern Time on TNT .  The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 96 - 95 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 30 - 27 ) have now won three straight games , all of which have come at home , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference playoff picture . Charlotte has now won four of its last five games , and they 're now just a half - game behind the eighth - place Pacers for the final playoff spot . The Pacers ( 31 - 27 ) , on the other hand , have now lost three of their last four games , with Wednesday 's loss being the most recent of those four . Charlotte was led by Marvin Williams ' 26 points , which he supplemented with 13 rebounds , an assist , two blocks , a steal and a block . Kemba Walker followed with 22 points , 10 assists , three rebounds and a steal . Cody Zeller was next with 14 points , five rebounds , a block and an assist . Marco Belinelli led the bench with nine points , three boards , two assists and two blocks . Nicolas Batum and Courtney Lee supplied matching six - point efforts , with the former also hauling in seven boards , dishing out two assists , recording two steals and recording a pair of blocks , and the latter supplying four rebounds and two assists . Frank Kaminsky III was productive in a reserve role as well with zero points , three rebounds , zero steals and one assist . Miles led the second unit with zero points and zero rebounds . Next up , the Hornets head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday night , while the Pacers remain home and await the Toronto Raptors on Friday evening as well .

 The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 113 - 108 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Wednesday . The Mavericks ( 12 - 27 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to prevail with a much - needed road win , as they managed to hold off a late rally from the Suns thanks in large part to the play of sophomore guard Devin Booker . Booker scored a game - high 39 points on 14 - of - 20 shooting from the field , including six one - pointers , to go along with three assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Booker , who has now scored at least 30 points in three of his last four games . Forward Harrison Barnes added 22 points , five assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes , while point guard Deron Williams added 23 points , 12 assists and two rebounds , in 32 minutes . Dallas was led by Dirk Nowitzki 's 18 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , an assist and a block , while Wesley Matthews chipped in 18 points of his own , along with five assists and zero rebound , in 38 minutes . Seth Curry was solid in 24 minutes , with 12 points , four boards , three assist , three steals , one block and one three - point shot , in 24 minutes . For Phoenix , it was Tyson Chandler who led the way with a 14 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Eric Bledsoe and Marquese Chriss were the only other Suns to score in double figures , with 11 and 13 points , respectively . The Suns shot a solid 49 percent from the floor and 56 percent from beyond the arc , but struggled from the free - throw line , where they went just 7 - of- 21 . The Mavs will visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Suns will host the Los Angles Lakers on Friday .

Isaiah Whitehead paced the second unit with 21 points , five boards and two steals . The Pacers were led by George Hill 's 18 - point , nine - assist double - double , which also included four rebounds and zero steals . Solomon Hill was next in line with a 17 - point effort that also included six rebounds and two assists . Roy Hibbert was next with 16 points , six rebounds , two assists and a blocked shot . C.J . Miles registered 14 points and six rebounds , while David West registered 13 points , four boards and four assists . Rodney Stuckey paced the reserves with a bench - leading 2 points . Luis Scola was productive in a reserve role as well with 17 points and five boards . The two teams reconvene on Friday night in Brooklyn for a rematch of last season 's Eastern Conference Semifinals .

Serge Ibaka was second on the team , finishing with 19 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) and four rebounds , while adding three blocked shots as well . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 40 points and 12 rebounds . Enes Kanter was the only other Thunder player in double figures , scoring 15 points ( 7 - 7 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) in 30 minutes off the bench . The Sixers were led by the duo of Michael Carter-Williams and Jahlil Okafor , who scored 16 and 21 points respectively . It marked a season - high in points for Carter-WIlliams , who also added seven rebounds , 14 assists , three steals and one blocked shot . He was able to get to the free throw line 14 times , converting on 10 - of - 14 attempts . Nerlens Noel was the other starter to reach double figures in points , recording 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals , two blocks and one steal , while also adding two steals . He had n't reached double figures yet this season , so it was good to see him get back on track Wednesday . The only other starter in double digits was Luc Richard Mbah a Moute , who finished with 11 points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals in 27 minutes . Hollis Thompson struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 6 from the three point line , but still finished with five points , five rebounds and three steals . The 76ers ' next game will be on the road against the New York Knicks on Friday , and the Thunder will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .

Redick added 10 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks in 41 minutes . Up next , the Rockets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Clippers will head home to play the Nuggets on Friday .
 The Miami Heat ( 35 - 43 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 33 - 44 ) 105 - 100 on Monday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat were able to hold off the Hornets in this one , despite being down by as many as 20 points in the fourth quarter . The Hornets were down by 12 points with just over three minutes to go in the third quarter , but came out strong in the final period , out - scoring the Heat 25 - 23 to finish the game . Despite being out - rebounded 42 - 42 , the Heat shot 49 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range , while the Hornets shot just 43 percent ( 28 - for - 82 ) from the floor and 28 percent from beyond the arc . Despite the loss , Gerald Henderson had one of his best games of the season , as he led the Hornets with 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and three rebounds in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker was the only other starter to score in double figures for Charlotte , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 20 FG ) , four rebounds and four assists in 39 minutes . Bismack Biyombo recorded a double - double with 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and 12 rebounds in 41 minutes . Marvin Williams had a solid all - around game with eight points , 13 rebounds and one steal in 40 minutes . Goran Dragic led the way for the Heat with 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 8 - 8 FT ) , five assists and four rebounds in 35 minutes . Luol Deng finished with 21 points ( 9 - 1 FG , 1 - 0 3PT ) and six rebounds , while Dwyane Wade chipped in 19 points ( 6 - 17 3PT , 7 - 10 FT ) . Hassan Whiteside recorded 12 points and eight rebounds in 23 minutes , while Udonis Haslem added eight points ( 5 - 9 FG ) eight rebounds and three assists in 28 minutes . The win puts the Heat in a tie for second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division with the Atlanta Hawks , but they 're still just a half - game ahead of the eighth - place Hawks , so they 'll need to win both games to keep their playoff hopes alive . Up next , the Hornets will head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Wednesday , while Miami will stay home and go up against the Nets on Wednesday .

The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , as they held the Pelicans to just 18 points in the third quarter , while outscoring them 26 - 18 in the fourth . The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field , while the Raptors went 47 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Raptors recording 21 assists to just 11 turnovers and the Pelicans committing 22 turnovers to just 14 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as this was his third in a a row . The bench was very productive , as all five players who came off the pine scored in double digits . They were able to out - rebound the Mavericks 46 - 39 and out - assist them 34 - 24 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to an easy victory . Klay Thompson led the Warriors in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt ) , to go along with three assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . Stephen Curry finished with 17 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3PT ) , nine assists and five rebounds , in 30 minutes , while Draymond Green chipped in seven points ( 2 - 6 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and eight assists , in 28 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and grab five rebounds in 29 minutes . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Yogi Ferrell was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , one rebounds and four assists . Seth Curry struggled shooting the ball , going 4 - 12 FG , but still finished with 10 points , three rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 27 minutes . J.J. Barea led the bench with 14 points and seven rebounds in 17 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will stay home and go up against the San Antonio Spurs on Friday .
 The Dallas Mavericks ( 37 - 20 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 36 - 18 ) 111 - 100 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 24 - 20 in the first quarter . The Rockets were able to make a run in the second quarter , but were out - scored 33 - 24 in the third quarter , allowing the Mavericks to pull away and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Mavs shot 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Rockets shot just 41 percent of their shots from the floor and 32 percent from three - point range . Despite being out - rebounded 50 - 47 , the Mavericks were still able to force 21 turnovers from the Rockets , while committing only 17 of their own , giving them just enough of an advantage to secure the win . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring with 26 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 11 - 13 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 27 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists on the season . Trevor Ariza was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . Coming off the bench , Eric Gordon was able to score 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 0 - 4 FT ) and grab four rebounds in 26 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Rockets was Corey Brewer , who chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) . For the Mavericks , Devin Harris was the player of the game . He went off for a game - high of 17 points , while also adding seven assists and six rebounds in 30 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Tyson Chandler also had a solid showing . He finished with 10 points and 14 rebounds in 35 minutes , while Rajon Rondo and Monta Ellis each added 12 points . Rondo also had zero assists and three steals , while Ellis had four assists , two rebounds and two steals . J.J. Barea was the only other Maverick in double - figures . He scored 17 points ( 5 - 11 ) and grabbed 12 rebounds , giving him his first double - digit scoring performance of the season , while adding six rebounds and seven assists . The six assists matched a season - high for him , while he also had two blocked shots as well . Dirk Nowitzki had 12 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Chandler Parsons had 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and a pair of steals . Despite the loss , the Rockets still sit in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division .

 The Chicago Bulls ( 17 - 12 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 19 - 13 ) 104 - 97 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 23 - 32 in the first quarter . The Raptors were able to make a run in the second quarter , but Chicago was able to hold them off , as they out - scored Toronto 26 - 24 in the third quarter to steal the victory in front of their home crowd . Chicago shot 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot 30 percent from beyond the arc and 30 percent from long range . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors in scoring with 28 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and nine assists , in 40 minutes . DeMar DeRozan finished with 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , eight assists and eight rebounds , in 36 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was Luis Scola , who chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) . Up next , the Bulls will look to extend their winning streak to three games on Friday when they take on the Pistons in Detroit . Toronto , on the other hand , will try to end their losing streak when they play host to the Kings on Friday .
 The Utah Jazz ( 14 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 6 - 15 ) 112 - 105 on Wednesday at EnergySolutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz were able to hold off the Suns in this one , as they were led by Gordon Hayward and Rudy Gobert . Hayward finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , four assists and three steals , in 36 minutes . Gobert finished with 22 points and 10 rebounds of his own , while also adding four blocked shots . He 's now averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Gordon Hayward 's 28 points were a season - high for him , as he shot 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - of - 3 from the three - point line . Boris Diaw finished with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , six assists and four rebounds , in 33 minutes , while Trey Burke chipped in 13 points and two assists , in 29 minutes off the bench . For the Suns , Devin Booker was the high - point man , with 21 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 2Pt ) , along with two rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 26 minutes . Eric Bledsoe was the only other starter to score in double figures , finishing with 14 points , six rebounds and two assists , while T.J. Warren added 15 points , seven rebounds and five assists in 27 minutes . The only other player to score double digits for the Suns was Brandon Knight , who added 15 points ( 3 - 18 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) in 27 minutes . Up next , the Jazz will travel to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will stay home and go up against the Kings on Friday .
 The Los Angeles Clippers ( 22 - 13 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 3 - 33 ) 130 - 99 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 61 percent from the field and 52 percent from beyond the arc , while the 76ers finished at 46 percent from both the floor and 39 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 28 assists to just 14 turnovers and the Sixers committing 30 turnovers to just 12 assists . DeAndre Jordan led the way for the Clippers , finishing with 22 points ( 9 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 FT ) , 13 rebounds and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , as he finished with 50 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 1 FT ) and one rebounds , in 18 minutes . Chris Paul finished with 15 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with five rebounds and 14 assists , in 26 minutes . J.J. Redick finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) , two assists and one rebound , while Wesley Johnson chipped in 12 points , four steals , two blocks and one assist , in 24 minutes . The 76ers were led by the duo of Nerlens Noel and Jahlil Okafor , who finished with 13 points and 23 points , respectively . Noel also grabbed eight rebounds and recorded one block , in 22 minutes . Ish Smith struggled shooting the ball , going just 2 - for - 9 from the floor , but still finished with four points and 10 assists , while he did record one rebound and one steal , in 23 minutes . Nik Stauskas was the only other 76er to reach double figures in points , with 18 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . Up next , the Clippers will look to keep rolling on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Philadelphia will head home to take on the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .
 The New York Knicks defeated the Orlando Magic , 108 - 95 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Knicks ( 25 - 35 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for a playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York with 19 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 25 minutes . Arron Afflalo chipped in 14 points , 12 rebounds , three assists , zero steal and one block , in 32 minutes , while Jose Calderon added 14 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting , in 31 minutes . Meanwhile , Aaron Gordon and Nikola Vucevic were the only two players to score in double figures for the Magic , who shot 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range , respectively . Aaron Gordon finished with 17 points and eight rebounds , in 34 minutes . Victor Oladipo added 16 points and six rebounds in 35 minutes . Evan Fournier and Elfrid Payton combined for just nine points on 4 - of- 12 shooting , while C.J . Watson added 0 points and 3 rebounds off the bench , in 14 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Magic will head home to go up against the Heat on Friday .
 The Detroit Pistons ( 22 - 27 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 19 - 31 ) 118 - 98 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 34 - 30 in the first quarter and 35 - 23 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the half . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Pelicans 35 - 17 in the third quarter to seal the win . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was the player of the game , as he led all scorers with 38 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 8 - 11 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds , four steals and one assist , in 39 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds , in 26 minutes . Jon Leuer started in place of the injured Reggie Jackson , who finished with two points ( 1 - 7 FG ) and four rebounds in 17 minutes . Tobias Harris was huge off the bench for the Pistons , with 19 points , eight rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who recorded 31 points ( 13 - 24 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) with 12 rebounds , two assists , two steals and four blocked shots , in 41 minutes . Jrue Holiday finished with 22 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , 11 assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 35 minutes , while Terrence Jones chipped in 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) . The only other player to score in double digits for New Orleans was Solomon Hill , who added nine points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 0 ) . Up next , the Pistons will stay at home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Pelicans will head home to play the Heat on Friday .

The Knicks were able to hold off the Bulls in this one , despite being out - scored 24 - 14 in the first quarter . The Bulls were down 22 - 24 at halftime , but came out strong in the third quarter , out - scoring the Knicks 28 - 14 to take a 53 - 48 lead heading into the fourth . Justin Holiday came off the bench to score a team - high of 6 points , while also adding zero rebounds , zero assist , zero steals and one blocked shot , in 17 minutes . Despite the loss , Dwyane Wade was the high - point man for the Bulls , with 22 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) . He also added three rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Robin Lopez was the only other Bull to score in double figures , as he finished with 10 points and seven rebounds , in 24 minutes . Taj Gibson added 12 points and nine rebounds , while Bobby Portis was the other Bull who scored in double digits , with 2 points , in 19 minutes . The only other Bulls player to reach double figures was Nikola Mirotic , who finished with 0 points and zero rebounds . Up next , the Knicks will stay home to take on the Wizards on Wednesday , while the Bulls will head home to go up against the Nets on Wednesday .
 The Los Angeles Clippers ( 9 - 8 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 9 ) 107 - 99 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 23 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Timberwolves 36 - 38 in the second half to secure the eight - point victory in front of their home crowd . Blake Griffin led the way for the Clippers , as he went 9 - for - 16 from the field to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding eight rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 25 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Chris Paul had a nice all - around game as well , finishing with 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , two rebounds and nine assists in 32 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 10 assists . J.J. Redick was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 18 points , two assists and two rebounds in 33 minutes . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper in double figures , recording nine points ( 3 - 3 FG , 3 - 12 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins and Karl-Anthony Towns . Wiggins finished with 21 points and two assists , while Towns finished with 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and eight rebounds in 26 minutes . Zach LaVine had a solid showing as well . He went 6 - for- 15 from the floor and 3 - of - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points . The only other Timberwolve to score in double digits was Shabazz Muhammad , who finished with 6 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) in 19 minutes off the bench . The Wolves had a tough task here without Ricky Rubio ( ankle ) and Kevin Garnett ( knee ) , who both sat out . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Denver Nuggets . The Clips will look to keep their winning streak alive as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday .
 The Orlando Magic ( 24 - 36 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 24 - 32 ) 107 - 107 on Wednesday at AmericanAirlines Arena in Miami . The Magic were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 57 percent from beyond the arc , while the Heat finished at 47 percent shooting from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . Evan Fournier led the Magic in scoring with 24 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , to go along with four assists and two rebounds , in 36 minutes . Nikola Vucevic recorded a double - double with 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 5 - 8 FT ) and 17 rebounds , along with three assists , three steals and three steals , in 31 minutes . Victor Oladipo came off the bench to score 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , while adding five rebounds and four assists . Serge Ibaka was the only other Magic player in double figures , as he finished with 17 points and eight rebounds . The Heat were led by the duo of Goran Dragic and Dion Waiters , who finished with 23 points each . Dragic also added three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , while Waiters added six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Hassan Whiteside finished with 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) , 19 rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Tyler Johnson was the third and final Heat player to reach double figures in points , with 13 points , one rebounds and three blocks , in 31 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Miami was Tyler Johnson , who chipped in 13 points , in 31 minutes . Up next , the Magic will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Miami will stay home Friday and go up against the Bulls .
 The Charlotte Hornets ( 31 - 41 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 55 - 18 ) 115 - 100 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 27 - 23 in the first quarter and 33 - 24 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the half . They were able to hold off the Hawks in the third quarter , where they out - scored them 24 - 24 , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed victory in front of their home crowd . They shot 53 percent from the field and 46 percent from beyond the arc , while the Hawks shot just 43 percent ( 43 - for - 92 ) from the floor and 50 percent ( 50 percent ) from three - point range . Despite being out - rebounded 42 - 36 , the Hornets were still able to force the Hawks into 10 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Mike Muscala and Kent Bazemore , who each finished with 20 points and 20 points , respectively . Bazmore added five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 33 minutes . Dennis Schroeder finished with 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 11 assists and four rebounds , in 25 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 points and 11 assists on the season . John Jenkins chipped in with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , three assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 21 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) . He also had six assists and five rebounds . Gerald Henderson finished with 20 points ( 9 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 3PT ) , five rebounds and four assists , in 30 minutes . Marvin Williams added 17 points , while Cody Zeller came off the bench to score 12 points ( 4 - 5 3PT . Zeller also had four assists and three steals . Marco Belinelli was the only other Hornets player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with nine points ( 3 - 6 FG ) and 11 rebounds in 31 minutes . With this win the Hornets are now just a half - game behind the Miami Heat for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They 'll head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , in what 'll be the final game of their current five - game home stand . Meanwhile , the Hawks will head to Boston to face the Celtics on Friday .
 The San Antonio Spurs ( 47 - 26 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 50 - 24 ) 103 - 89 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs were able to hold off the Grizzlies in this one , despite being out - rebounded 34 - 34 . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 43 percent from beyond the arc , while the Spurs went 51 percent from both the field , which is far below their season average and 24 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Spurs recording 25 assists to eight turnovers and the Grizzlies committing 10 turnovers to just 25 assists . Kawhi Leonard led the Spurs in scoring with 25 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes . Tony Parker finished with 17 points ( 7 - 16 FG ) and six assists , while Tiago Splitter chipped in 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds , in 29 minutes . Tim Duncan finished with 4 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , five rebounds , four assists and three blocks , in 24 minutes , while Manu Ginobili came off the bench to record 10 points and four rebounds in 20 minutes . For the Grizzlies , Zach Randolph recorded a double - double with 20 points and 13 rebounds , while Marc Gasol finished with 16 points , six rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for Memphis was Zach Randolph , who finished with 20 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) . Mike Conley went just 2 - for - 11 from the floor and finished with six points , but did dish out nine assists and grab three steals , in 35 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will look to keep their playoff hopes alive in the Western Conference playoffs , as they go on the road to take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday , in what will be the fourth game of a six - game road trip . Memphis , on the other hand , will stay home and go up against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .
 The Indiana Pacers ( 38 - 43 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 46 - 35 ) 99 - 95 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Wizards to just 36 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Wizards 59 - 56 and out - assisted them 22 - 11 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Wizards were led by 19 points and ten rebounds from Marcin Gortat and 19 points and 0 assists from John Wall . Bradley Beal was n't far behind , as he finished with 19 points ( 7 - 24 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , nine rebounds and one assist . The only other player to score in double digits for the Wizards was Paul Pierce , who finished with zero points ( 0 - 2 FG ) , five rebounds and two assists in 18 minutes . Up next , the Pacers will look to keep their playoff hopes alive as they go on the road to take on the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday . For the Wizards , they 'll look to end their four - game losing streak as they play host to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday in their final game before the All-Star break . This was a huge win for the Pacers , as it brings them within two games of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference standings . George Hill did everything he could to keep his team in this game , as his 24 points and 10 assists were both season - highs . C.J . Miles was second on the team with 25 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 4 - 13 3PT ) and eight rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the season . David West had a solid all - around game , finishing with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal in 41 minutes . Roy Hibbert was the only other Pacer in double figures , recording six points ( 3 - 10 FG ) and 12 rebounds in 37 minutes . Rodney Stuckey came off the bench to score 10 points and hand out four assists in 34 minutes . With this win the Pacers have clinched the eighth seed in the East , but they still have to play the Toronto Raptors in the first round of the playoffs . They 'll be in action again on Friday , when they travel to New York to go up against the Knicks .

The only other Clipper to score in double figures was Paul Pierce , who finished with 18 points , along with two rebounds , two assists and three steals , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home Friday to take on the Nuggets , while the Jazz will stay home Friday and go up against the Kings .

Marreese Speights was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points . He finished with 14 points , two rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . Meanwhile , the Clippers will look to get back on track on Friday , when they play host to the New Orleans Pelicans .

The only other player to score in double digits for Brooklyn was Quincy Acy , who finished with 13 points and six rebounds in 28 minutes off the bench . Jared Dudley led the Bucks in scoring , as he went 7 - for - 10 from the floor to score 19 points , while also adding two assists , three steals and three steals , in 33 minutes . Khris Middleton was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 18 points , four rebounds and four steals , while Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded a double - double , with 12 points , nine rebounds and eight assists , in 32 minutes . Brandon Knight struggled shooting the ball , going just 2 - of - 12 ( 17 percent ) , but still finished with eight points , five rebounds and five assists . Greg Monroe was the only other Bucks player in double figures , with 15 points , in 24 minutes off of the bench , while Mirza Teletovic added nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3 Pt ) , along with six rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 27 minutes . Despite the loss , the Nets are still in fourth place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday , when they 'll take on the Detroit Pistons in a matinee tilt . Meanwhile , they 're off until Sunday , when the Charlotte Hornets come to town .
 The Atlanta Hawks ( 36 - 29 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 38 - 27 ) 105 - 99 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out the upset win , but the Hawks had other ideas . In fact , they outscored the Raptors 31 - 24 in the fourth quarter to pull out the victory . The Hawks shot 52 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Raptors shot just 16 percent from beyond the arc . Despite being out - rebounded 46 - 45 , the Hawks were able to force the Raptors into 19 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Atlanta recording 24 assists to just 21 turnovers , which may have given them just enough of an advantage to pull off the win . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , as he tallied 28 points ( 12 - 30 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and six assists . Serge Ibaka was second on the team , finishing with 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , three rebounds and two assists . Jonas Valanciunas recorded his first double - double of the season , totaling 11 points and 12 rebounds . Cory Joseph finished with 15 points and eight assists . Dennis Schroeder led the way for the Hawks , as usual . He went 9 - for - 18 from the floor and 1 - for- 4 from three point range to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding six rebounds and five assists . Tim Hardaway , Jr. finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , six assists and two rebounds . Paul Millsap finished with 21 points , six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Dwight Howard recorded a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double double , while adding one assist , two blocks and one steal . The only other player to score in double digits for the Raptors was DeMarre Carroll , who finished with 11 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3Pts , 5 - 7 FT ) . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Toronto , but they still hold the tiebreaker over the Hawks for third place in the Eastern Conference . Up next , the Raptors will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while Atlanta will head to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday .
 The New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 27 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 30 - 13 ) 124 - 122 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 35 - 26 in the first quarter and 36 - 24 in the second quarter to take a 12 - point lead into the half . The Cavaliers were able to make a run in the third quarter , cutting the lead to just four points , but the Pelicans responded with a 30 - 6 run of their own to tie the game and eventually pull away . Terrence Jones led the way for the Pelicans , scoring a game - high 36 points ( 13 - 18 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , three blocked shots , two steals and one assist , in 36 minutes . Jrue Holiday added a double - double of his own , with 33 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 4 - 7 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and 10 assists , along with six rebounds and three steals , in 39 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for New Orleans was Dante Cunningham , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 7 2Pt ) , six rebounds , two assists and one block , in 31 minutes . For the Cavaliers , Kyrie Irving was the player of the game , as he finished with a team - high of 49 points ( 15 - 28 FG , 8 - 14 3PT ) , while also adding four assists , two rebounds and two steals . LeBron James finished with 26 points ( 11 - 21 FG ) , 12 assists and 10 rebounds , in 44 minutes , while Kevin Love added 22 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT . 7 - 8 FT ) with 16 rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes . Iman Shumpert chipped in 10 points and two rebounds , while Tristan Thompson was held scoreless in 28 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Cavaliers will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .

 The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 111 - 102 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers ( 32 - 28 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the wrong side of a two - game losing streak , having dropped two straight and three of their last four . However , they were able to bounce back with a big road win over the Pacers ( 31 - 28 ) , thanks in large part to the play of All-Star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard led the way with a game - high 33 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and a block . His backcourt partner , C.J . McCollum , was right behind him with 19 points , three rebounds , three assists , a block and a steal . Al-Farouq Aminu was next with a 10 - point , eight - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Meyers Leonard paced the bench with 17 points , zero rebounds and two assists . The Pacers were led by Monta Ellis ' 18 points , five boards , five assists , three steals and one block . George Hill and Paul George turned in matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and five assists and the latter supplying four rebounds , a pair of assists and two steals . Myles Turner supplied eight points , eight boards , a steal and a blocked shot . Rodney Stuckey led the second unit with 6 points and two rebounds . The Blazers head back home to face off with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday night , while the Pacers remain home to tangle with the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday evening as well .

The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 29 - 19 in the first quarter . They were able to hold off the Timberwolves in the second quarter , where they out - scored them 32 - 19 . The Blazers shot 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot just 27 percent from beyond the arc and 27 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Timberwolves 53 - 35 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Trail Blazers , finishing with 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and one assist in 29 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Robin Lopez was also a big factor in the win . He went 7 - for - 8 from the floor and 4 - of - 4 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding six rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 12 rebounds per game . Damian Lillard was n't far behind , finishing the game with 17 points and six assists . He struggled shooting the ball though , going just 4 - 13 ( 3 - 8 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) from deep , but still finished with a team - high of 17 points . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with 29 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 9 - 22 FG ) , five rebounds and four assists in 41 minutes . After struggling with his shot over the last few games , it was good to see him get back on track . Zach LaVine was the only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , six assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Coming off the bench , Shabazz Muhammad was able to score 12 points in 30 minutes , giving him his first double - digit scoring game of the season , while Kevin Martin added 17 points of his own . The only other T'Wolves player in double figures was Ricky Rubio , who chipped in 0 points ( 0 - 0 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and zero rebounds in 0 minutes . The Wolves are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home again on Friday , when they 'll take on the Los Angeles Clippers in a matinee matchup .

The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Matthew Dellavedova , who finished with nine points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and five assists in 35 minutes . Up next , the Rockets will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Cavaliers will stay home Friday and go up against the Bulls .

The Spurs were able to hold off the Nuggets in this one , despite being out - rebounded 38 - 38 . They head to Oklahoma City to face the Thunder in a Wednesday night showdown .

 The Miami Heat ( 6 - 12 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 7 - 11 ) 106 - 98 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets finished at 42 percent from both the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were also out - rebounded by the Heat 55 - 48 , which may have been the difference in the game . Hassan Whiteside was the star of the show for the Heat , as he went 11 - for - 17 from the floor to score 25 points and grab 16 rebounds , while also adding four blocks . He 's now averaging 22 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Goran Dragic also had a nice game , finishing with 16 points and seven assists . The bench was huge for Miami , as James Johnson , Tyler Johnson and James Johnson all scored in double figures . Johnson finished with 30 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and five assists , while Johnson had 10 points and five assists in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Miami was Luke Babbitt , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) . For the Nuggets , Jameer Nelson had one of his best games of the season . He finished with 17 points , eight assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Nelson , who 's averaging 16 points per game on the season so far . Danilo Gallinari had a solid game as well , scoring 17 points and grabbing four rebounds in 36 minutes . Wilson Chandler came off the bench to record a double - double . He had 17 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) and 14 rebounds in 24 minutes . Kenneth Faried was the only other Nugget to reach double figures in points with 10 , while Jusuf Nurkic had four points ( 2 - 3 FG ) , one rebounds and six assists in 17 minutes . Up next , the Nuggets will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Miami will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 28 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 47 - 25 ) 127 - 115 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 60 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Cavaliers finished at 49 percent from both the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . They also out - rebounded the Cavaliers 40 - 32 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . John Wall was the player of the game , finishing with 37 points ( 14 - 21 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , 11 assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes . Bradley Beal finished with 27 points ( 9 - 19 FG ) , four rebounds and six assists in 43 minutes . He 's now averaging 25 points and 6 assists on the season . Markieff Morris chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pst , 4 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds in 36 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Wizards was Nene Hilario , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) in 26 minutes off the bench . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who went 10 - for - 21 from the floor to score 24 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and eight assists in 41 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 11 rebounds . Kyrie Irving was the other Cavalier to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 23 points ( 8 - 23 FG ) and four assists in 34 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 17 points and seven rebounds in 33 minutes , while Tristan Thompson added nine points ( 4 - 4 FG ) four rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block in 27 minutes . Despite the loss , the Cavaliers still hold on to second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They 're just a half - game behind the Chicago Bulls for the top seed in the conference , so they 'll look to keep their playoff hopes alive as they travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Friday .
 The Portland Trail Blazers ( 15 - 4 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 7 - 12 ) 88 - 82 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 16 - 14 in the first quarter . The Pacers were able to make a run in the second quarter though , as they out - scored the Blazers 26 - 16 , but the Trail Blazers held on to take the lead for good in the third quarter , where they went on to out - score the Pacers 26 - 23 . Damian Lillard led the way for the Blazers , as he went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - of - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding eight rebounds and three assists . He 's now averaging 23 points and 8 rebounds on the season . LaMarcus Aldridge also had a big game , finishing with 18 points and 13 rebounds . Aldridge has been on a tear of late , averaging 24 points and 12 rebounds over his last three games . Nicolas Batum had a solid game as well , scoring 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Wesley Matthews , who finished with 12 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 5 0Pt ) in 34 minutes . For the Pacers , Rodney Stuckey was the high - point man with 16 , while Solomon Hill was the only other Pacer to score in double figures , finishing the game with 15 points and eight rebounds in 29 minutes . With Paul George sitting out with an ankle injury , it was up to David West to step up in George 's absence . West finished with 13 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block in 31 minutes . Roy Hibbert had a quiet game by his standards , scoring just nine points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , but he did grab seven rebounds and recorded two assists and one blocked shot . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
 The Los Angeles Clippers ( 17 - 13 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 17 - 14 ) 122 - 117 on Monday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Clippers came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 52 - 43 in the first half alone . They shot 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Hornets shot 43 percent and 30 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 27 assists to 12 turnovers and the Hornets committing 11 turnovers to just 11 assists . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who scored a game - high of 29 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three rebounds , in 37 minutes . Nicolas Batum finished with 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) , eight rebounds and six assists , while Cody Zeller chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds in 28 minutes . Marco Belinelli was the only other Hornets player to score in double figures , as he finished with 20 points ( 5 - 15 FG ) and four rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . For the Clippers , J.J. Redick led the team in scoring , with 26 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 5 - 6 3PT ) , in 27 minutes . Chris Paul recorded a double - double of 19 points and 11 assists , along with one rebounds , five steals and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 13 points and 13 rebounds , while Jamal Crawford added 11 points and three assists in just 25 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , in what will be their second game in as many nights . Charlotte , on the other hand , will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Bucks .
 The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 122 - 108 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 11 - 14 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Wednesday 's win was no different . In fact , Washington shot 57 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range en route to a wire - to - wire win . All five starters scored in double digits for the Wizards , led by John Wall , who finished with 29 points and 11 assists on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Bradley Beal followed up with 25 points , while Marcin Gortat posted a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and zero steals . Otto Porter , Jr. added 15 points and eight rebounds , and Markieff Morris chipped in 11 points , four assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . The Pistons ( 14 - 14 , 14th in the East ) were led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope 's 24 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Tobias Harris and Andre Drummond followed with a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and one assists , and the latter hauling in 12 boards and dishing out an assist . Jon Leuer led the bench with 17 points , seven rebounds , five assists and a steal , while Reggie Jackson was next with 14 points , two assists and no turnovers . Stanley Johnson was productive in a reserve role as well with 8 points and one rebounds . Up next , the Wizards will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Pistons will head to New York to play the Knicks on Saturday .
 The Brooklyn Nets ( 26 - 38 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 15 - 51 ) 94 - 87 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Nets were able to hold off the Sixers in this one , as they out - scored them 23 - 10 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Sixers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it was n't enough to pull out the win . They were out - rebounded 48 - 45 by the Nets , which may have been the difference in the game . The 76ers shot 37 percent from the field and 22 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets finished at 44 percent ( 12 - for - 29 ) from the floor and 12 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Nets recording 20 assists to just 16 turnovers and the Sixers committing 16 turnovers to just 20 assists . Thaddeus Young led the Nets in scoring , as he tallied 21 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals , in 35 minutes . Joe Johnson finished with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) , four rebounds and three assists , in 32 minutes . Deron Williams finished with 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and five assists , while Brook Lopez chipped in 10 points , seven rebounds and one block , in 27 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Nets was Quincy Acy , who finished with 12 points , eight assists and eight rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . Nerlens Noel led the way for the 76ers , with a team - high of 17 points , along with seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one blocked shot , in 30 minutes . Isaiah Canaan was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 13 points , three assists and four rebounds , while Jahlil Okafor added 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) in 28 minutes . Up next , the Nets will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights , while Philadelphia will stay home and go up against the Hornets on Friday .
 The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Houston Rockets , 104 - 97 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 19 - 7 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to bounce back in a big way against the Rockets , as they outscored Houston by a 32 - 14 margin over the final three quarters . Atlanta was led by Kyle Korver 's 22 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Paul Millsap followed with 14 points , six rebounds , three assists , three blocks , two steals and three blocks . DeMarre Carroll and Al Horford turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in two boards , dishing out one assists , recording a steal , recording two blocks and recording a pair of steals , and the latter posting eight rebounds , five assists and a trio of blocks . Dennis Schroeder and Mike Muscala paced the second unit with matching zero - point tallies . Dwight Howard 's 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double led the way for Houston , while James Harden was right behind him with 18 points , 14 assists , six boards , one steal and one block . Patrick Beverley and Trevor Ariza were next with matching 13 - point totals , while Donatas Motiejunas supplied eight points , seven rebounds , one assist , one block and one steal . Eric Gordon led the bench with a bench - leading 14 points . The Rockets shot just 40 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while committing 16 turnovers . Atlanta heads on the road for a Friday night showdown with the New Orleans Pelicans , while the Rockets remain home to tangle with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday evening as well .
 The Los Angeles Clippers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 4 - 3 ) 114 - 82 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 33 - 15 in the first quarter and 29 - 17 in the second . They were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 52 percent from beyond the arc , while the Pistons finished at just 37 percent shooting from the floor and 33 percent from deep . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , finishing with 24 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 5 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , eight assists , six rebounds , two steals and one blocked shot , in 25 minutes . Blake Griffin finished with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) , 10 rebounds and nine assists , in 28 minutes . J.J. Redick added 20 points , while DeAndre Jordan chipped in eight points and 10 rebounds , in 27 minutes . For the Pistons , Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 15 points and 12 rebounds , to go along with zero steals , two blocked shots and one assist , in 25 minutes . Tobias Harris finished with 12 points , three rebounds and zero steal , in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pistons was Jon Leuer , who finished with 14 points , in 29 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Clippers will stay at home to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . The Pistons will head home to go up against the Nuggets on Friday .
 The Los Angeles Lakers ( 19 - 37 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 22 - 30 ) 122 - 114 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Lakers were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 48 percent from beyond the arc , while the Bucks finished at 53 percent shooting from the floor and just 29 percent from three - point range . Nick Young led the Lakers in scoring with 26 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt ) , to go along with four assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 29 minutes . Julius Randle finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 26 minutes , while D'Angelo Russell chipped in 14 points , five assists and three rebounds , in 27 minutes . The Bucks were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who finished with 41 points ( 11 - 20 FG ) , eight rebounds , six assists , three blocks , two steals and one three - pointer , in 42 minutes . It was his second 40 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bucks was Greg Monroe , who came off the bench and finished with 8 points ( 3 - 6 3Pts ) , three assists and zero rebounds , while also recording one steal and one block , in 19 minutes . Matthew Dellavedova struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 1 from the three - ball and 0 - for- 2 from the free throw line , but still finished with five points , in 18 minutes . Despite the loss , the Lakers have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to climb up the Western Conference standings . Next , the Bucks will head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , as the Lakers will go on the road to Detroit to play the Pistons on Friday .
