The Celtics came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Pacers to just 40 percent shooting from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Pacers 47 - 42 and out - assisted them 28 - 16 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . He 's now averaging 25 points and 8 assists on the season . C.J . Miles was the only other Pacer to score in double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , while adding four rebounds and one assist in 30 minutes . Coming off the bench , Rodney Stuckey finished with 12 points and three rebounds in 24 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , after scoring 16 points and grabbing seven rebounds against the Bulls on Saturday . Up next , the Celtics will head home Wednesday to take on the Nets , while the Pacers will stay home Wednesday and go up against the Heat .

The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 32 in the first quarter . The Raptors were able to make a run in the second quarter though , as they out - scored the Timberwolves 33 - 21 , but it was too little , too late . Karl-Anthony Towns was the star of the game , as he scored a game - high of 35 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 11 - 13 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and three blocked shots , in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Andrew Wiggins was also a big factor in the win , as his 26 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 18 FG ) , three rebounds and two steals were all season - highs for him . Ricky Rubio finished with 19 points , eight rebounds and eight assists , while Gorgui Dieng recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 6 - 9 FT ) and 10 rebounds , in 41 minutes . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , with 35 points on 11 - 19 shooting from the field and 3 - 3 from three - point range , in 37 minutes . Kyle Lowry struggled shooting the ball , going 4 - 15 from the floor and 1 - 7 from long range , but still finished with 14 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 39 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas finished with 12 points and seven rebounds , while Terrence Ross chipped in 11 points and three rebounds off the bench . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home to take on the Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Raptors will head home to go up against the Kings on Wednesday .

Up next , the Wizards will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday when they host the Minnesota Timberwolves , while New York will head home to take on the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Timberwolves ( 8 - 19 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having dropped their previous two contests by a combined nine points . However , they were able to prevail with a much - needed win over the Suns , as Karl-Anthony Towns led the way with 28 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 26 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Zach LaVine was right behind him with 23 points , while Gorgui Dieng posted a 10 - point , nine - rebound double - double that also included an assist , two blocks and a steal . Tucker and Marquese Chriss were the only other Suns to manage double - digit scoring , with the former adding four points , and the latter posting four points , six rebounds , an assist and one steals . Meanwhile , the Timberwolves remain home and await the Portland Trail Blazers for a Friday night showdown .

 The Dallas Mavericks ( 14 - 11 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 15 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 25 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to finish the game shooting 49 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 23 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , seven assists , five rebounds , three steals and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 7 assists on the season . Jon Leuer recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 33 minutes . It was his second double - doubles in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 20 rebounds over that span . Brandon Knight was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Suns . He finished with 12 points , four rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes . Zaza Pachulia had a quiet game by his standards , scoring just four points ( 2 - 3 FG , 0 - 0 3PT ) , but he did grab 12 rebounds and recorded three steals in 28 minutes . Raymond Felton was the high - point man for the Mavericks , finishing with 17 points , while Deron Williams chipped in 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 6 Pt ) and four rebounds in 35 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 14 points , seven rebounds and four assists in 29 minutes . Devin Harris had a nice game off the bench , scoring 12 points on 3 - 8 shooting , including 2 - 5 from long range , to go along with zero rebounds , two assists and one blocked shot in 23 minutes . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Devin Harris , who scored 12 points in 23 minutes . Up next , the Mavericks will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Suns will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
 The Brooklyn Nets ( 5 - 12 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 14 - 5 ) 127 - 122 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . Sean Kilpatrick led the way for the Nets with a season - high of 38 points , as he led all scorers with 38 points on 14 - of - 34 shooting from the field , to go along with 14 rebounds and two assists , in 47 minutes . Brook Lopez followed up with 27 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 43 minutes . Trevor Booker chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , 11 rebounds , five assists , four steals and four steals , in 42 minutes , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points ( 2 - 7 FG , 10 - 12 FT ) and six rebounds , in 26 minutes . The Clippers were led by Chris Paul , who recorded a double - double with 26 points and 13 assists , along with 10 rebounds and one blocked shot , in 45 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 21 points and 23 rebounds , while J.J. Redick added 18 points , two assists and two rebounds . The only other Clipper to score in double figures was Jamal Crawford , who finished with 11 points , in 35 minutes off the bench . The Nets out - rebounded the Clippers 54 - 56 and shot 42 percent from the floor , while the Clippers shot just 42 percent . Up next , the Nets will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second night of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Clippers will head home Friday to go up against the Pistons .
 The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Miami Heat , 109 - 85 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Monday . The Bucks ( 11 - 10 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their fifth win in six games . Milwaukee shot 56 percent from the field , while holding Miami to just 44 percent shooting . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 21 assists to just 21 turnovers , while the Heat committed 18 turnovers to just 21 assists . Milwaukee 's offense was on point all night , as they hit 56 percent of their field goal attempts , while Miami could n't crack 44 percent . Dwyane Wade led the Heat in scoring , as he tallied 28 points , three rebounds and eight assists on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Chris Bosh finished second on the team , with 21 points , six rebounds and two steals . Mario Chalmers was the only other Miami player to score in double figures , totaling nine points and six assists . The Heat will look to bounce back on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Orlando Magic . Milwaukee was led by Malcolm Brogdon 's 20 points , four assists and three rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 14 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and zero steal . Jabari Parker and Brandon Knight each scored 13 points a piece , with Parker adding three rebounds , three assists and zero blocks , while Knight dished out five assists , grabbed five rebounds and recorded a steal . Khris Middleton was a nice spark off the Milwaukee bench , totaling 14 points , two assists and six rebounds in 24 minutes of action . Milwaukee will be off until Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game .
 The Golden State Warriors ( 29 - 5 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 18 ) 112 - 94 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 30 - 32 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Cavaliers 28 - 18 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the fourth quarter . The Cavaliers battled back to make it a one - point game with just over a minute left in the fourth , but the Warriors had other ideas . They went on a 15 - 4 run to end the game , and that was the difference in the game . Golden State shot 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while the Cavaliers went 41 percent ( 30 - for - 74 ) from the floor and 30 percent from long range . J.R. Smith led the Cavaliers in scoring with 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 42 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 23 points , six rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 41 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 17 points and 14 rebounds , while Tristan Thompson chipped in 11 points , nine rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 30 minutes . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors , with 24 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 10 3PT ) , four rebounds and two assists , while Stephen Curry added 23 points and 10 assists , in 35 minutes . Draymond Green finished with 10 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists , three blocks , three steal and one block , in 31 minutes . Marreese Speights finished with 22 points , eight rebounds , one steals and three blocks , in 22 minutes , while Andre Iguodala added 5 points ( 1 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 1- 1 FT ) and two rebounds , in 25 minutes off the bench . Next up , the Warriors play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the San Antonio Spurs on Friday . Meanwhile , the Cavaliers host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a home - and - home set .
 The Atlanta Hawks ( 45 - 12 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 39 - 21 ) 104 - 87 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were able to hold off the Mavericks in this one , despite being out - rebounded 44 - 44 . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 16 percent from beyond the arc , while the Hawks went 46 percent from both the floor and 37 percent from deep . Despite the loss , the Hawks were still able to out - rebound the Mavericks 41 - 44 and out - assist them 28 - 20 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Despite playing just 30 minutes , Monta Ellis led the Mavericks with 19 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and two assists . He 's now averaging 19 points and 5 assists on the season . J.J. Barea was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) , five rebounds and seven assists . The only other player to score in double figures for the Mavericks was Richard Jefferson , who finished with 10 points ( 1 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , to go along with four rebounds and one assist . With Dirk Nowitzki sitting out with an illness , it was up to Bernard James to step up and do the heavy lifting for the Mavs . James finished with seven points ( 2 - 3 FG ) and 11 rebounds , while also recording three assists and two blocked shots in 27 minutes of action . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Hawks , as they continue to battle for the eight - seed in the East . Dennis Schroder was the high - point man for Atlanta , going off for 17 points ( 7 - 15 FG ) in just 21 minutes off the bench . Paul Millsap finished with 15 points and eight rebounds in 33 minutes , while Kyle Korver added 16 points and six rebounds of his own . Al Horford finished with 11 points , eight rebounds and six assists , while DeMarre Carroll and Jeff Teague chipped in 11 points each . With this win the Hawks have now won three of their last four games . They 're currently in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are just a half - game behind the top - seeded Detroit Pistons . They head to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday night in their next scheduled game .
 The Boston Celtics ( 43 - 25 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 28 - 39 ) 117 - 117 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 30 - 32 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Timberwolves 32 - 17 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the fourth . The Timberwolves came out strong in the fourth quarter though , outscoring the Celtics 32 - 27 to make it a one - point game , but it was n't enough as the Celtics pulled away in the final minutes . Isaiah Thomas led the way for the Celtics , scoring 27 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , to go along with four assists and three rebounds , in 32 minutes . Al Horford finished with 20 points ( 9 - 12 FG ) , nine rebounds and eight assists , in 30 minutes , while Avery Bradley chipped in 18 points ( 7 - 12 ) , three rebounds and four assists . Jae Crowder struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - 8 from the field and 1 - 5 from the three - point line , but finished with seven points , four rebounds and one block , in 28 minutes . Marcus Smart was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and six assists in 26 minutes off the bench . Karl-Anthony Towns and Ricky Rubio led the Timberwolves in scoring , with Towns finishing with 23 points and 14 rebounds , while Rubio added 23 points and seven assists . Andrew Wiggins finished with 3 points , while Nemanja Bjelica added 21 points of his own . The only other player to score in double digits for the Timberwolves was Shabazz Muhammad , who finished with a team - high of 21 points . Up next , the Timberwolves will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Celtics will stay home and play the Heat on Friday .
 The Atlanta Hawks ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 4 - 3 ) 112 - 97 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets finished at 44 percent shooting from the floor and 33 percent from long range . The Rockets were also out - rebounded 44 - 43 , giving the Hawks even more of an advantage , but they were still able to hold the lead for the majority of the game . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring with 30 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and 11 assists , but he did turn the ball over a game - high eight times in 37 minutes of action . He also recorded nine rebounds , 11 assists and three steals in the victory . He 's now averaging 31 points , 9 rebounds and 10 assists on the season . Clint Capela recorded a double - double with 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Eric Gordon struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 11 for nine points in 30 minutes . Paul Millsap led the way for the Hawks in this five , finishing with 23 points , 11 rebounds , five assists , five steals and one blocked shot , in 34 minutes . Dwight Howard recorded 20 points and 15 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Kent Bazemore finished with 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , four rebounds and four assists , in 32 minutes . Dennis Schroeder finished with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 5PT , 2 3PT and 3 - of - 4 FT ) and a team - high 10 assists , while Kyle Korver chipped in 10 points , one rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 30 mintues . Up next , the Rockets will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Atlanta will stay home and go up against the Pistons on Friday .

The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 18 - 23 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the majority of the game , as the Pacers never led by more than 12 points in the second half . He finished with 22 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 10 - 13 FT ) and 17 rebounds , along with seven blocked shots , in 37 minutes .  The Chicago Bulls ( 9 - 5 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 7 - 7 ) 118 - 110 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 30 - 30 right away in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Lakers 56 - 37 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to an easy win . Jimmy Butler led the way for the Bulls , scoring a game - high of 40 points ( 14 - 23 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and six assists , in 40 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Nikola Mirotic was also a big factor in the win , as he finished with 15 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 4 - 8 FT ) and 15 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Rajon Rondo struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 9 from the field , but still finished with 12 assists , nine rebounds and one steal , in 36 minutes . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams , who went 8 - for 14 from the floor and 5 - for 6 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding three assists , two steals and one rebound , in 30 minutes off the bench . Nick Young chipped in 15 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Julius Randle added 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 25 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other Lakers ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 18 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) along with six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one blocked shot , in 26 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will head home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
 The Chicago Bulls ( 20 - 9 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 20 ) 113 - 93 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Lakers finished at just 39 percent from both the floor and 31 percent from deep . Pau Gasol led the way for the Bulls , going 9 - for - 14 from the floor to score 23 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and three assists . He 's now averaging 23 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Derrick Rose was also a big factor in the win , finishing with 20 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six assists and one steals . He was able to get to the free throw line six times , converting on all six of those attempts . Jimmy Butler also had a strong showing , finishing the game with 21 points , six rebounds and five assists . Joakim Noah was the only other Bull to reach double figures in points , as he finished with four points ( 2 - 8 FG ) , 12 rebounds and two assists . The Lakers were led by Wesley Johnson , who finished with 19 points ( 6 - 18 FG ) and nine rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds per game . Ed Davis had a solid game as well , posting 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 FT ) and 14 rebounds . He also had three blocked shots and three steals . Jordan Hill had 16 points and six rebounds of his own . The only other Los Angeles player in double figures was Wayne Ellington , who chipped in 12 points and two rebounds . Up next , the Bulls will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday , when they travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers , while Los Angeles will head home to play the Nets on Friday .
 Joel Embiid 's 33 - point , 10 - rebound double - double led the way for the Sixers , and he added three blocks and two steals . Robert Covington was next with 15 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Gerald Henderson and Sergio Rodriguez supplied matching 9 - point efforts , while Nerlens Noel led the bench with 0 points . Jahlil Okafor mustered just three points but hauled in 10 rebounds and recorded zero steals and a block . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez 's 22 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , eight assists , four blocks , one steal and one three - pointer . Bojan Bogdanovic and Isaiah Whitehead supplied 14 and 11 points , respectively , while Quincy Acy led the second unit with 19 points . Trevor Booker ( five points , six rebounds , four assists ) and Sean Kilpatrick ( seven points , four rebounds , four assists ) were the only other members of the first unit with double digits in the scoring column .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 24 - 24 in the first quarter and 34 - 24 in the second quarter to take a 20 - point lead heading into the locker room . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as the Suns were n't able to make a run in the fourth quarter . Up next , the Clippers will head home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
 The Golden State Warriors ( 54 - 5 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 33 - 28 ) 109 - 105 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left no doubt who the better team was , as they pulled out a wire - to - wire win in this lopsided matchup . Golden State shot 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hawks to 46 percent shooting from the floor and 36 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Hawks 51 - 42 and out - assisted them 25 - 25 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors , as he finished with 26 points ( 8 - 27 FG , 6 - 16 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and five assists in 39 minutes . He 's now averaging 26 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists on the season . Andrew Bogut had a solid game as well , finishing with 19 points and seven rebounds in 31 minutes . Draymond Green recorded a triple - double with 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , 13 rebounds and nine assists in 42 minutes . It was his second straight double - double and third in the last four games . Harrison Barnes chipped in 12 points and two assists in 41 minutes . The Hawks were led by Paul Millsap , who had 19 points ( 5 - 17 FG ) , seven rebounds , four assists , three steals and four blocked shots in 41 minutes . Al Horford finished with 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists , while Kent Bazemore added 15 points and nine rebounds in 35 minutes . Dennis Schroder was the only other player to score in double figures for the Hawks . He finished with 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and one rebound in 21 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Warriors will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Hawks will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .
 The Atlanta Hawks ( 5 - 2 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) 110 - 106 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference Finals . The Hawks were able to hold off the Cavaliers for the win Wednesday , as Dennis Schroeder hit a game - winning jumper with less than a second remaining in the fourth quarter . Schroeder finished with 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , six assists and two rebounds in 32 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Schroeder , who has now scored at least 20 points in each of his last three games . Kent Bazemore added 25 points of his own , while Paul Millsap chipped in 21 points . Millsap has been one of the few bright spots for the Hawks this postseason , as he 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Dwight Howard was the only other player to score in double figures for the Cavs , as the team 's big man finished with seven points and 17 rebounds in 27 minutes . Kyrie Irving was the high - point man for Cleveland with 29 points ( 11 - 27 FG , 1 - 7 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) . He also had four assists and one block in 39 minutes . Kevin Love had 24 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , 12 rebounds and three steals in 38 minutes , while LeBron James added 23 points , nine rebounds and five assists in 37 minutes . Tristan Thompson was held scoreless in 25 minutes , and J.R. Smith had six points ( 2 - 13 FG , 2 - 10 3 Pt ) , two rebounds , three assists , two steals and two steals . The Cavaliers shot just 37 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Game 7 will take place Friday in Cleveland , and the Hawks will travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers .

The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 42 percent from beyond the arc , while the Kings finished at 41 percent from both the floor and 30 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 28 assists to eight turnovers and the Kings committing six turnovers to just six assists . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to keep the Kings in it though , as he finished with 25 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocked shots in 36 minutes . Rudy Gay finished with 18 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) and seven rebounds in 33 minutes , while Ty Lawson chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , six assists and four rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 6 rebounds on the season . J.J. Redick was the only other Clipper in double figures , finishing with 119 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 5 - 3 3PT ) , four rebounds and one assist in 32 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , and the Clippers will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
 The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 123 - 106 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 9 - 5 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to extend their winning streak to four games , and they did just that . Indiana jumped out to a 33 - 31 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as they never relinquished the lead after that . They held the lead for the entirety of the second half and held a double - digit lead at times in the third quarter . Paul George led the way for the Pacers with 40 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals on 14 - of - 19 shooting , in 37 minutes . C.J . Miles followed up with 32 points , while Monta Ellis chipped in 10 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . George Hill added 14 points , four rebounds and five assists , in 32 minutes , while Rodney Stuckey was solid off the bench , with 5 points , zero rebounds , three assists , zero steals and two blocks . As a team , the Pacers shot 55 percent from the field and 73 percent from three - point range , while Washington shot 46 percent and 39 percent from long range , but committed 21 turnovers , compared to Indiana 's only 20 . The Wizards ( 6 - 5 ) were led by John Wall and Bradley Beal , who both finished with 20 points each . Wall added five assists and four rebounds , while Beal added four boards and three assists . Marcin Gortat had a near double - double with 10 points and nine rebounds , in 24 minutes . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with 23 points , in 29 minutes , as he hit five three - pointers , including five from beyond the arc . The only other Washington player to score in double digits was Nene Hilario , who added 11 points , along with seven rebounds and four assists . Up next , the Wizards travel to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday night , while the Pacers head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday evening as well .

The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 23 - 23 in the first quarter alone . They went on to out - score the Mavericks 34 - 23 the rest of the way , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to a much - needed win in front of their home crowd . Dallas will look to bounce back , as they travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Friday .
 The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 30 - 12 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 23 - 18 ) 99 - 74 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 24 - 18 in the first quarter , but the Heat battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Heat 24 - 16 in the final quarter to secure the victory and keep their playoff hopes alive . Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder , scoring 24 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block , in 31 minutes . Kyle Lowry struggled shooting the ball , going 5 - for - 17 on his way to 15 points , but he did dish out six assists , while adding zero rebounds , four steals and one blocked shot . Lucas Nogueira finished with 13 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 ) , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and two blocked shots in 35 minutes . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while Raptors will stay home and play the Kings on Friday .
 The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 11 - 16 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 7 - 20 ) 100 - 85 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Timberwolves came out firing on all cylinders in this one , as they out - scored the Nets 26 - 16 in the first quarter and never looked back after that . They shot 48 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range , while the Nets shot just 24 percent from beyond the arc and 24 percent from long range . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves in scoring with 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , two blocks , two assist , one steal and one block , in 28 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 10 rebounds per game . Andrew Wiggins was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , three rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . Coming off the bench , Nemanja Bjelica had a huge game . He recorded 20 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT , 10 rebounds and three assists , in 36 minutes . Ricky Rubio struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - 6 from the floor and 0 - 1 from three , but still finished with eight points , 15 assists , two rebounds and four steals , in 28 minutes . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who finished with 20 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and two blocked shots , in 40 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 12 ) , while Thaddeus Young chipped in 12 points and eight rebounds , in 33 minutes . Despite the loss , the Nets had 26 assists on 39 made field goals , which was good for a team - high . Up next , the Timberwolves will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while Brooklyn will stay home Friday and go up against the Pistons .
 The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 27 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 12 - 27 ) 101 - 96 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 32 - 21 in the first quarter . The Timberwolves were able to make a run in the second quarter , but the Thunder responded with a big run of their own to cut the deficit to just two points by halftime . The two teams traded baskets in the third quarter , with Oklahoma City outscoring Minnesota 21 - 18 , but it was too little , too late . Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder , scoring a game - high of 30 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Meanwhile , the Thunder head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday .

 The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 116 - 112 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday . The Raptors ( 14 - 7 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but fell just short in this close one . The second quarter is where the Raptors made their mark , as they outscored the Cavaliers 34 - 30 in that 12 - minute stretch . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Toronto recording 22 assists to just seven turnovers , while Cleveland committed 14 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Cavaliers ( 14 - 5 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 11th win in their last 12 games . LeBron James was the player of the game , as he tallied 34 points , eight rebounds and seven assists in the win . Kevin Love recorded his second double - double of the season , totaling 28 points and 14 rebounds in the victory . Kyrie Irving was n't far behind , accumulating 24 points , seven assists and two rebounds of his own . Kyle Korver was a nice spark off the bench , providing 10 points , five rebounds and two assists . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , dropping 31 points , four rebounds and five assists on 12 - of - 23 shooting . Kyle Lowry finished second on the team with 24 points and nine assists . Jonas Valanciunas was the only other Raptor in double figures , totaling four points and 10 rebounds . Toronto will look to get out of this slide on Sunday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks . Cleveland will be right back in action on Sunday against the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who finished with 15 points , four rebounds and two blocked shots , in 28 minutes . Rudy Gay was the only other player to score in double figures for the Kings , as he finished with 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds , in just 28 minutes off of the bench . Ty Lawson finished with one point ( 0 - 4 FG ) and six assists , while Omri Casspi and Arron Afflalo combined for 12 points , three rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes . Up next , the Bucks will stay home to take on the 76ers on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Kings will head home to go up against the Bulls on Friday .

The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 32 - 21 in the first quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to finish the game shooting 58 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the three - point line , while the Bucks finished at 50 percent shooting from the floor and 27 percent from deep . Up next , the Mavericks will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Milwaukee will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 33 - 21 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 31 - 25 ) 120 - 98 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 38 - 32 right away in the first quarter . They went on to out - score the Thunder 34 - 22 in the second quarter , giving them the cushion they needed to coast to a comfortable victory . They shot 57 percent from the field , while the Thunder shot just 21 percent from beyond the arc . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Wizards recording 27 assists to just 22 turnovers , while committing six less turnovers to the Thunder 's 16 . The Thunder were led by the duo of Russell Westbrook and Enes Kanter . Westbrook finished with 17 points ( 5 - 19 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists , while Kanter added 17 points and six rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Thunder was Steven Adams , who finished with nine points ( 2 - 7 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 19 minutes . The bench was the only other Thunder player in double figures , as they combined for 40 points , with all five of them coming from Anthony Morrow , who came off the bench and finished with 5 points and 1 rebounds in 16 minutes . For the Wizards , Markieff Morris was the player of the game . He went 8 - for - 14 from the floor to score 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and two steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Bradley Beal was n't far behind , finishing with 22 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 6 - 7 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) of his own , to go along with three assists and zero turnovers . It was a season - high in points for Beal , who 's averaging 21 points per game over his last five games . John Wall recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , five rebounds , 14 assists and two blocked shots , while Otto Porter , Jr. had an 18 - point ( 6 - 11 FG ) and 12 - rebound game , giving him his second double - digit scoring game in a row . The other three starters scored in double - figures for the Wizards as well , with Marcin Gortat , Bojan Bogdanovic and Nene Hilario all reaching double figures in points as well with 12 , 11 and 11 points respectively . With the win , the Wizards improved to 20 - 9 at home this season . They 're currently in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and have a hold of the eighth seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana to take on the Pacers on Friday night .

Terrence Jones recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and 13 rebounds , along with three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 31 minutes . Dwight Howard finished with 13 points and 11 rebounds , in 21 minutes , while Trevor Ariza chipped in 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who went 6 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding three rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes . Carlos Boozer finished with 17 points and seven rebounds , while Jordan Hill added seven points , 10 rebounds and one block , in 23 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Lakers was Nick Young , who finished with 11 points , in 22 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Rockets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for both teams . Kobe Bryant and the Lakers will look to get back on track Friday , when they play host to the Clippers .

The Celtics were able to hold off the Bucks in this one , despite being out - rebounded 47 - 47 by the Bucks . Despite the loss , the Celtics were still able to out - rebound the Bucks 44 - 44 and out - assist them 26 - 23 . The key for the Celtics was the rebounding , as they snatched down 44 boards to the Bucks 47 . Isaiah Thomas was the player of the game , as he went off for a game - high of 37 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 6 - 11 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with eight assists and three rebounds in 41 minutes . Jae Crowder was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 4 - 10 3PT ) , six rebounds and four assists in 38 minutes . Marcus Smart came off the bench to score 9 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 0 - 2 7PT , 2 - 3 FT ) and grab four rebounds in 35 minutes , while also adding five assists and zero steal . Amir Johnson was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points with 11 , while adding seven rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , going 8 - for - 16 from the floor to score 21 points , while grabbing seven rebounds . He also had six assists and a blocked shot in 45 minutes . Malcolm Brogdon was a big reason for Milwaukee 's success though , scoring 11 points and grabbing two rebounds in just 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Greg Monroe also had a nice game off of the bench , scoring 14 points and pulling down 13 rebounds in 35 minutes . Matthew Dellavedova and Tony Snell each scored 12 points of their own , with the former adding six assists , two rebounds , zero steal and zero blocked shot , and the latter adding two rebounds and zero block . Jabari Parker struggled shooting the ball , going just 2 - of - 113 ( 2 - 3 FG ) , but still finished with one points , four rebounds and eight assists in 31 minutes . The only other Buck in double figures was Ersan Ilyasova , who chipped in 11 points and five assists in 32 minutes . Next , the Bucks will look to get out of this rut on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers . This will be the second game of a back - to - back , as the Celtics will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday as well .
 The Golden State Warriors ( 16 - 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 9 ) 112 - 85 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 22 - 28 in the first quarter . The Pelicans were able to make a run in the second quarter though , cutting the Warriors ' lead to six points , but the Warriors responded with a 32 - 12 run of their own to put the game out of reach . Golden State shot 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans shot just 42 percent and 20 percent from deep . Despite being out - rebounded 56 - 47 by the Warriors , the Pelicans were still able to force 17 turnovers from the Pelicans , which may have been the difference in the game . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans in scoring with 30 points ( 14 - 19 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocked shots , in 38 minutes . Jrue Holiday finished with 12 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , eight assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 33 minutes . Tyreke Evans was the only other Pelican to score in double figures , as he finished with 11 points , while Omer Asik added nine points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 15 rebounds . Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors . Curry finished with 19 points and 11 assists , in 31 minutes , while Thompson finished with 23 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Harrison Barnes chipped in 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 40 minutes . Draymond Green finished with 14 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) , 14 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 32 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to record 12 points and six rebounds , while Andrew Bogut added eight points , 11 rebounds , one assist and four blocks , in 29 minutes . Next up , the Warriors play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . New Orleans will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Sacramento Kings on Thursday .
 The Denver Nuggets defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 113 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Nuggets ( 9 - 15 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest on the wrong side of a two - game losing streak , having now dropped two straight and three of their last four . However , they were able to bounce back with a big road win over a struggling Magic ( 10 - 15 ) squad that had lost three of its last four games . Denver was led by Danilo Gallinari 's 21 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds and three assists . Jusuf Nurkic was next with a near double - double of 17 points and eight rebounds , while Will Barton supplied 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Jamal Murray paced the bench with 2 points , 1 rebounds and an assist . Jameer Nelson was productive in a reserve role as well with 9 points , zero rebounds , three assists , zero steals and two blocks . The Magic were led by Evan Fournier 's 24 points and Serge Ibaka 's 22 . Bismack Biyombo and Aaron Gordon were next with matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in six boards , four assists , a steal and a block , and the latter supplying six rebounds . D.J . Augustin registered 10 points , seven assists , one rebound and one steal . Nikola Vucevic led the second unit with 17 points , and Jeff Green supplied seventeen points , one assists and four rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench . Both teams play on Friday , as the Nuggets visit the Miami Heat , while the Magic visit the New Orleans Pelicans .

Brook Lopez finished with 17 points and seven rebounds , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 13 points , zero steals and two assist , in 28 minutes .  The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 93 - 74 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 33 - 43 ) have been struggling mightily recently , but they showed some resiliency in Wednesday 's win over the Hornets ( 32 - 43 ) . Indiana held Charlotte to just 35 percent shooting from the field and 22 percent from three - point range , while also limiting them to 18 turnovers and forcing them to commit 20 of their own . Three-point shooting was the glaring difference in the game , with the Pacers going 12 - for - 28 from long distance , while the Hornets went just 5 - of - 26 . Indiana also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 55 - 42 . The Hornets were led by Gerald Henderson , who tallied 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist . Marvin Williams finished with 10 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block . Kemba Walker struggled mightily , as he tallied just six points , three assists , a rebound and a steal . Frank Kaminsky III led the bench with a 10 - point , nine - rebound double - double , while Marco Belinelli provided 10 points and nine assists as well . Miles and Rodney Stuckey , who scored 12 and 15 points , respectively . George Hill finished with four points , 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Roy Hibbert was the only other Pacer to score in double figures , totaling six points and seven rebounds . Monta Ellis came off the bench to provide 13 points , two rebounds , two assists and four steals in 20 minutes of action . The Indiana starters outscored the Charlotte starters , 58 - 38 , but it was n't enough to get the job done against a shorthanded Hornets squad . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks .

The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 48 percent from beyond the arc , while the Heat finished at 56 percent from both the floor and 38 percent from deep . They outscored the Heat 33 - 30 in the fourth quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 assists on the season . Up next , the Hawks will head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Friday , while Miami will stay home and go up against the Nets on Friday .
 The Miami Heat defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 97 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . The Heat ( 11 - 6 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to pull out the victory . In fact , Miami outscored Oklahoma City , 23 - 19 , in the fourth quarter to pull away . The key for the Heat was their defense , as they held the Thunder to 44 percent shooting from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Miami recording 25 assists to just nine turnovers , while Oklahoma City committed 15 turnovers to just 15 assists . The Thunder ( 11 - 8 ) had to play this game without Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook and they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to beat a hot Heat team . Westbrook led the team in scoring , as he tallied 25 points , five rebounds and six assists on 8 - of - 18 shooting . Kevin Durant finished second on the team , totaling 25 points and nine rebounds . Enes Kanter was the only other player in double figures , totaling 10 points , three rebounds and zero assists off the bench . Serge Ibaka started for Durant and finished with nine points , seven rebounds and one steal in 33 minutes of action . On deck for the Thunder is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Miami has now won four of their last five games , as this was a much - needed win to keep their playoff hopes alive . Dwyane Wade was the player of the game , accumulating 28 points , four rebounds and four assists . Chris Bosh finished with 16 points and eight rebounds , while Goran Dragic accrued 14 points and seven assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded a double - double , amassing 11 points , eight rebounds and two blocks in the win . Tyler Johnson was a nice spark off of the bench , providing 8 points , two rebounds , three assists , zero steal and one block . Miami will look to build off this win on Friday against the Orlando Magic in their next game .

For the Bulls , it was a forgettable night on the offensive end , as they shot just 45 percent as a team . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bulls was Taj Gibson , who had 12 points in 25 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Chicago will head home to play the Kings on Friday .
 The Utah Jazz ( 5 - 3 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 6 ) 109 - 84 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 58 percent from beyond the arc , while the Sixers finished at 40 percent from both the floor and 33 percent from deep . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Jazz recording 20 assists to just 20 turnovers , while committing 10 turnovers to the Sixers ' 16 . Gordon Hayward led the way for the Jazz , going 9 - for - 17 from the floor to score 20 points , while also adding seven rebounds and five assists . Derrick Favors recorded a double - double , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) and 14 rebounds . He 's now averaging 16 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Rodney Hood was also a big factor in the win , as he finished with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The only other Jazz player to reach double figures was Trey Burke , who came off the bench to score 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) in 20 minutes . The 76ers were led by Joel Embiid and Robert Covington , who each finished with 14 points and nine rebounds . Embiids also added nine rebounds and one steal , while Covingon had four rebounds and two steals . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson struggled shooting the ball , as they combined for just 11 points on 4 - of - 18 shooting . The Sixers will look to bounce back on Friday in a road matchup against the New York Knicks . Meanwhile , the Jazz will be off until Sunday , when they host the Brooklyn Nets .

Up next , the Clippers will head home to take on the Pacers on Friday , while Brooklyn will stay home and play the Knicks on Friday .

 The Miami Heat defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 106 - 82 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . The Heat ( 19 - 13 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to extend their winning streak to three games , and they did just that . Miami jumped out to a 22 - 10 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as they never relinquished the lead after that . Hassan Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 25 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included a block and a steal . Goran Dragic and Chris Bosh followed up with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding seven assists , seven rebounds and zero steals , and the latter posting seven rebounds and four assists . Tyler Johnson and Luol Deng were the only other Miami players to score in double digits , as the team shot a stellar 56 percent from the field overall . The Mavericks ( 19 14 ) , meanwhile , saw their losing streak extend to four games . Zaza Pachulia was the high - point man for Dallas with 14 points , to go along with 13 rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Dirk Nowitzki was next with 11 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 12 points , four boards and one assist . Devin Harris led the bench with zero points , zero assists and zero rebound . J.J. Barea and Chandler Parsons combined for just 11 points on 4 - of - 19 shooting . The Mavs shot a paltry 36 percent from behind the arc and committed nine turnovers . Dallas remains in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday night . Whiteside 's 25 points paced the Heat , a total he supplemented with 19 rebounds and one block . Bosh was right behind him with 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists and zero steals . Dragic posted a full stat line of 15 points , seven assists , four rebounds , three steals and three blocks . Wayne Ellington led the second unit with 19 points , while James Johnson was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points and seven rebounds . Miami remains atop the Eastern Conference , and is currently in second place in both the Southwest Division and the eighth seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Friday evening for a showdown with the New Orleans Pelicans .

Andre Drummond recorded nine points and 18 rebounds in 33 minutes , while Tobias Harris and Marcus Thornton each scored 16 points of their own . Detroit 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while Miami will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .

The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 26 - 23 in the first quarter and 32 - 21 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the locker room . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Suns by 16 points in the fourth quarter to seal the win in front of their home crowd . Smith was the other Cavalier to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 18 points , three rebounds and four assists in 23 minutes . Tucker finished with 13 points and seven rebounds in 35 minutes , while Archie Goodwin chipped in 12 points , five assists and two steals in 30 minutes . The Grizzlies came out firing on all cylinders in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 25 - 18 in the first quarter and 39 - 19 in the second quarter to take a double - digit lead heading into the fourth . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the way , as they went on to out - score the Mavericks by a 39 - 33 margin in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 16 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and six rebounds in 30 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 rebounds on the season . He did turn the ball over four times though , so it was n't all good for the point guard . Monta Ellis and Chandler Parsons both chipped in with 12 points each , while Tyson Chandler had nine points and 13 rebounds in 36 minutes . Chandler Parsons has been the Mavericks best player over his last three games , averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds over that span . The Mavs are now just a half - game behind the Houston Rockets for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings . They 're currently slotted in the seventh seed as well , so they 'll need to keep things rolling if they want to have a shot at that eighth spot . The only other player to score in double figures for the Grizzlies was Zach Randolph , who added 21 points in 34 minutes . With the win , the Grizzlies are now tied with the Oklahoma City Thunder for third place in the Southwest Division . They head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday night . Meanwhile , the Mavericks have now lost four of their last five games , but they 're still in the thick of things in the race for eighth in the West . They have a couple days off before taking on the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday .

Up next , the Kings will head home Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while Denver will stay home Friday and go up against the Trail Blazers .

Jared Sullinger was next with 17 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Boston shot 48 percent from the field and 40 percent from beyond the arc , but they committed 18 turnovers and were out - rebounded by a 36 - 36 margin . Up next , the Pistons will travel to Indiana on Friday to take on the Pacers , while the Celtics head to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Friday .

The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 36 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nets finished at just 39 percent from both the floor and from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Pelicans 50 - 32 , giving them an advantage in the rebounding column as well . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Coming off the bench , Alexis Ajinca had a big game as well , finishing with 16 points and 1 assists in 29 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 37 points and 14 assists over that span . Robinson finished with 11 points and 15 rebounds , while Sims finished with 12 points ( 5 - 11 ) and seven rebounds of his own . The only other player to reach 12 points was Trevor Booker , who had 15 points and three rebounds in 26 minutes . He was able to dish out nine assists , giving him his first double - doubles of the season , so it was n't all bad for him . Up next , the Pelicans will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Brooklyn will stay home and go up against the Heat on Friday .

The Hawks ( 28 - 22 ) have been dominant at home this season , and Wednesday 's win over the Mavs was no different . Atlanta shot 53 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while holding Dallas to 37 percent shooting and 27 percent from beyond the arc . Kyle Korver followed with 16 points , while Al Horford chipped in 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and a block . Paul Millsap supplied a modest eight points but hauled in 12 rebounds , while Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the second unit with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Chandler Parsons led the way for Dallas with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Dirk Nowitzki was right behind him with 18 points and three rebounds . Wesley Matthews and Deron Williams combined for just nine points on 3 - of - 12 shooting , but Charlie Villanueva led the bench with 0 points . Zaza Pachulia posted a modest four points but did haul in 13 rebounds . The Mavericks remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday night . Teague complemented his scoring total with five rebounds , eight assists and one steals . Korver added three assists , two rebounds and one block . Kent Bazemore went for four points , nine rebounds and three assists . Thabo Sefolosha led the Hawks bench with six points and four rebounds . Atlanta remains in fourth in the East , and has a hold of the fifth seed as well , with the Nets currently in second place . They 're home again Friday night for a showdown with the Pistons .

The Mavericks shot just 41 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded 53 - 32 by the Celtics . Up next , the Celtics will stay home to take on the Pistons on Friday , while the Mavericks will head home to go up against the Hornets on Friday .
 The Miami Heat ( 34 - 26 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 30 - 29 ) 129 - 111 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 68 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Bulls finished at 46 percent from both the floor and 48 percent from beyond the arc . They also out - rebounded the Bulls 38 - 29 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the victory . The Bulls were led by Pau Gasol , who finished with 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds and six assists in 30 minutes . Derrick Rose was the only other Bull to reach double figures in points , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , one assists and three steals in 24 minutes . Taj Gibson added 13 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 5 - 7 FT ) and three rebounds in 23 minutes . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to score a team - high of 16 points , while Bobby Portis chipped in 11 points and seven rebounds in 27 minutes as well . Despite the loss , the Bulls are still in the thick of things in the Eastern Conference playoff race , as they are just a half - game behind the eighth - place Nets for the eighth and final playoff spot . Joe Johnson was the high - point man for the Heat , going 10 - for - 13 from the floor to score 24 points , to go along with five rebounds , four assists and one block in 33 minutes . Luol Deng added 20 points ( 8 - 10 FG ) , four rebounds and two assists in 37 minutes . Goran Dragic finished with a double - double of his own , recording 17 points and 11 assists , while Dwyane Wade added 18 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal in 34 minutes . Tyler Johnson led the bench in scoring , as he finished with 26 points , 14 rebounds and four blocked shots in 32 minutes . Up next , the Heat will look to extend their winning streak to four games on Friday , when they play the Trail Blazers in Portland . Meanwhile , they 'll look to continue their winning ways against the Bucks in Milwaukee on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 9 - 3 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 7 - 7 ) 111 - 100 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc , while the Bucks finished at 43 percent from both the floor and 33 percent from deep . The Bucks were also out - rebounded 53 - 36 , which may have been the difference in the game . Paul Pierce led the Wizards in scoring , finishing with 25 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while also adding two assists and zero steal , in 28 minutes . John Wall finished with 21 points , nine assists , four rebounds , five steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , with 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and 13 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 35 minutes . Bradley Beal chipped in 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , six assists and two rebounds , in 34 minutes off the bench . Brandon Knight was the high - point man for the Bucks , with 27 points ( 10 - 18 FG ) , to go along with six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one blocked shot , in 37 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the only other player to score in double figures , as he finished with 20 points , five assists , three steals and four rebounds . Jabari Parker struggled shooting the ball , going 3 - for - 11 from the floor , but still finished with six points and five rebounds . Khris Middleton started in place of the injured Greg Monroe , who was out with an ankle injury . Middleton finished with three points , three rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Tony Snell was the most productive bench player , with 13 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 21 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while Milwaukee will stay home and play the Pistons on Friday .
 The Orlando Magic ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 26 - 13 ) 121 - 114 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 29 - 21 in the first quarter . They went on to go on to win the rest of the way , as they out - scored the Bulls 59 - 48 in the second quarter and finished the game shooting 59 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . They were able to out - rebound the Bulls 43 - 34 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Magic , scoring a game - high of 33 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , to go along with two rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Nikola Vucevic recorded a double - double of his own , with 33 points and 11 rebounds , in 38 minutes . Elfrid Payton finished with 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes , while Channing Frye chipped in five points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes . The Bulls were led by Pau Gasol , who finished with 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG ) and 14 rebounds , along with zero assist , two blocks , one steal and one three - pointer , in 35 minutes . Derrick Rose finished with 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , while Jimmy Butler added 17 points and two assists , in 43 minutes . Joakim Noah started in place of Rajon Rondo , who sat out with an ankle injury . Noah finished with six points , seven rebounds , four assists and a block , while Bobby Portis chipped - in 12 points and four assists off the bench , in 24 minutes . Up next , the Magic will head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday , while the Bulls will stay home and go up against the Pistons on Friday .
 The Portland Trail Blazers ( 32 - 13 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 29 - 15 ) 103 - 96 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as they led by at least 12 points for the final 30 - plus minutes . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this game , going 40 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards finished at 49 percent shooting from the floor and 33 percent from long range . The Wizards were led by John Wall and Paul Pierce , who each scored 25 points . Wall finished with 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , four rebounds and nine assists , while Pierce added six rebounds and two assists . Bradley Beal finished with 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds and five assists . Nene Hilario was the only other Wizards player to score in double figures , as he finished with 15 points and four assists . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Trail Blazers , finishing with 26 points ( 9 - 22 FG ) , nine rebounds and three assists . Damian Lillard finished with 20 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 8 - 8 FT ) and seven assists . Chris Kaman recorded his first double - double of the season with six points ( 3 - 9 FG ) and 10 rebounds . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Allen Crabbe , who finished with zero points ( 0 - 0 FG ) in 7 minutes . Meyers Leonard came off the bench to record 9 points and two rebounds in 21 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while Portland will stay home and play the Nuggets on Friday .
 The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 10 - 40 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 37 - 13 ) 90 - 89 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Grizzlies came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 23 - 24 in the first quarter and 26 - 19 in the second quarter , but the Timberwolves were able to make a run in the third quarter , where they out - scored the Grizzlies 25 - 20 . The Timberwolves were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc , while the Grizzlies finished at 52 percent shooting from the floor and 17 percent from three - point range . Minnesota also out - rebounded the Grizzlies 43 - 30 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Zach Randolph only played 29 minutes , but still finished with six points ( 3 - 7 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 29 minutes . Thaddeus Young added 14 points and eight rebounds , while Nikola Pekovic recorded 13 points and three rebounds in 22 minutes . Next up , the Timberwolves will look to extend their winning streak to three games on Friday , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Grizzlies will head home to take on the San Antonio Spurs on Friday .

The Pacers were able to hold off the Clippers in this one , despite being out - scored 35 - 17 in the fourth quarter . The Clippers were up by as many as 17 points in the second quarter , but the Pacers came out strong in the third quarter , out - scoring the Clippers 35 to 17 to take a nine - point lead heading into the final period . With the win , the Pacers improved to 9 - 8 on the road this season . Up next , the Clippers will stay at home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Pacers will head home to play the Kings on Friday .
 The Washington Wizards ( 6 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 7 - 6 ) 97 - 95 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they led for the majority of the game , as they led by as many as 26 points in the first half . The Pistons were led by Reggie Jackson , who scored 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with nine assists and three rebounds in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 assists on the season . Marcus Morris was the other big contributor for the Pistons , as he scored 18 points ( 6 of 14 FG , 2 - 6 2Pt ) , while grabbing nine rebounds and four assists in 37 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova was the only other Piston to score in double figures , as his 18 points were good for a team - high . The only other player to score double digits for Detroit was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 3Pts ) . The win gives the Wizards their first win of the season and they 'll look to keep it going against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday in their next game . The loss drops the Pistons to 6 - 6 and they continue to be one of the worst teams in the Eastern Conference . They 'll have a tough task on Friday when they travel to Indiana to take on the Pacers . This was the second game in a row the Wizards were without Bradley Beal , who 's dealing with an ankle injury , but he was able to play through it and still finished with seven points and one assist in 28 minutes . Otto Porter was the Wizards ' best player on the night , scoring 17 points on 6 of 12 shooting from the field and 2 of 3 from the three - point line in 31 minutes . Marcin Gortat finished with 14 points ( 7 of 11 FG ) and eight rebounds in 26 minutes , while Nene Hilario came off the bench to score 18 points and grab seven rebounds in 22 minutes . Washington 's next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday .

 The Toronto Raptors ( 49 - 23 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 26 - 46 ) 115 - 91 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Pelicans finished at 44 percent shooting from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 23 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 assists on the season . Norman Powell was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds in 34 minutes . Kyle Lowry struggled shooting the ball , going just 3 - of - 13 for 11 points , but he did add eight assists , two rebounds and two steals in 28 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 10 points and nine rebounds in 26 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Alonzo Gee , who finished with 18 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and eight rebounds in 41 minutes . It was a season - high in points for him , while it was also his second straight game with at least eight rebounds . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Terrence Jones , who scored 14 points ( 6 - 11 ) and grabbed five rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench . The other three starters combined for just 21 points , with Toney Douglas , Alexis Ajinca and Dante Cunningham combining for just 12 points . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Pelicans , who are now just a half - game ahead of the eighth place Heat for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . The win brings the Raptors within two games of the Heat for that final spot , as they 're currently tied with the Heat and the Heat , so they 'll head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday . The victory also gives them a hold of the third seed in the Eastern Conference , which is currently held by the Heat . The Jazz hold the tiebreaker over the Raptors for that position , so it 's possible they could end up taking the season series with the Raptors if they win both games . The Clippers are currently in second place in the East , so the Pelicans ' loss does n't give them enough momentum to make up for the loss . Up next , the Raptors will head home to face the Clippers on Friday , while New Orleans will travel to Charlotte on Friday to play the Hornets .
 The New York Knicks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 105 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Knicks ( 5 - 6 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this win . In fact , they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they led by at least seven points for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as the Knicks held the Pistons to 49 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while forcing them to commit 10 turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with New York recording 24 assists to just nine turnovers , while Detroit committed 10 turnovers to just 19 assists . The Pistons ( 6 - 6 ) had to play this game without Reggie Jackson and they simply did n't have the legs to keep up with the Knicks . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the team in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , four rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris was second on the team , totaling 19 points and 10 rebounds . Ish Smith finished with 14 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Jon Leuer was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points and nine rebounds on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Kristaps Porzingis was the player of the game though , accumulating 35 points , seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Carmelo Anthony and Derrick Rose were n't far behind , totaling 22 points and 15 points , respectively . Joakim Noah was the only other Knick in double figures , totaling seven points , 15 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal . Justin Holiday led the bench with nine points , five rebounds and zero assists . Up next , the Knicks will stay home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Pistons will head home to play the Pacers on Friday .
 The Detroit Pistons ( 5 - 19 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 13 ) 95 - 90 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from beyond the arc , while the Kings finished at 36 percent shooting from the floor and just 38 percent from deep . The Kings were also out - rebounded by the Pistons 55 - 43 , giving the Pistons just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Josh Smith led the Pistons in scoring with 21 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds , six assists , five blocks and two steals , in 38 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , with 02 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds , along with two steals and one block , in 26 minutes . Tobias Harris was huge off the bench , as he finished with 24 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 8 - 9 FT ) and eight rebounds , in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pistons was Kyle Singler , who finished with 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) , four rebounds and two blocked shots , in 26 minutes . Rudy Gay was the high - point man for the Kings , with 20 points , while also adding eight rebounds and eight assists , in 36 minutes . Ben McLemore finished with 14 points , six rebounds and one blocked shot , in 31 minutes . Darren Collison struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line , but still finished with three points , seven assists , three rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Willie Cauley-Stein was the only other Kings player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 15 points and 11 rebounds in 24 minutes . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , while Sacramento will stay home and go up against the Grizzlies on Friday .
